mt: 雅各布人成功地击败了吉龙丹人的宽恕的最后呼吁。
ref: 雅各宾派人成功破坏了吉伦丁人要求从宽处置的呼吁。
dipper_l80_o40: The Girondins’ last plea for mercy was repelled by the Jacobins.

src: The last eruption of this dominantly basaltic volcano in 1707 ejected andesitic pumice and formed a large new crater on the east flank.
mt: 1707 年爆发的最后一次主要的火山爆发喷射出了讨厌的南瓜 ， 并在东侧形成了一个新的大火山口。
ref: 这座以玄武岩为主的火山在 1707 年的最后一次喷发喷出了安山岩浮石 ， 在东侧形成了一个新的大火山口。
dipper_l80_o40: The last eruption of this volcano, which is mainly basaltic, took place in 1707, and threw out andesitic pumice, which formed a large crater on the eastern side.

src: Kyle Gallner portrayed "Beaver ", Dick's introverted younger brother.
mt: 凯尔 · 盖纳描绘了迪克内向的弟弟 "海狸" 。
ref: 凯尔 · 加纳 （ Kyle Gallner ） 饰演了迪克内向的弟弟 “海狸 ” 。
dipper_l80_o40: The role of “Beaver” was played by Kurt Gallner, and he was the shy younger brother of Dickie.

src: Captain Boomerang joins up with other Central City villains to destroy The Flash.
mt: 波美朗上尉与中央城的其他恶棍一起消灭了闪电.
ref: 波美朗上尉与中央城的其他恶棍一起打败了闪电。
dipper_l80_o40: Captain Boomerang and the other super-villains of Central City are plotting to destroy the Flash.

src: Congress reauthorized the suspension of habeas corpus at President Davis' discretion.
mt: 国会重新授权由戴维斯总统斟酌决定中止人身保护令。
ref: 国会根据戴维斯总统的自由裁量权重新授权暂停人身保护令。
dipper_l80_o40: Congress had reaffirmed the right of the President to suspend the writ of habeas corpus.

src: A feud and graffiti war between Banksy and King Robbo broke out when Banksy allegedly painted over one of Robbo's tags.
mt: Banksy 和 Robbo 国王之间爆发了一场争斗和涂鸦战争 ， 据称 Banksy 在 Robbo 的一个标签上涂上了油漆。
ref: 班克斯和罗布泊国王之间的恩怨和涂鸦战争爆发了 ， 据称 ， 班克斯涂掉了罗布泊的一个标签。
dipper_l80_o40: The ensuing battle between Banksy and King Robbo was a war of tags.

src: She arrives at a farmhouse, where she discovers a woman's mangled corpse.
mt: 她到了一个农舍, 在那里发现了一个女人的满身尸体.
ref: 她来到一间农舍 ， 在那里她发现了一具支离破碎的女尸。
dipper_l80_o40: She came to a hut, where she found the mangled corpse of a woman.

src: West Virginia's next drive ended in a punt, which Whittle misjudged, pinning Oregon State at their own 30.
mt: 西弗吉尼亚州的下一次赛事以一拳告终 ， 怀特尔误判 ， 将俄勒冈州划入了自己的 30 分。
ref: 西维吉尼亚州的下一球以一记悬空球告终 ， 而惠特尔的判断失误 ， 将俄勒冈州队压在了 30 分。
dipper_l80_o40: The next drive of West Virginia ended in a punt, which Whittle misjudged and pinned the Beavers back at their own thirty-yard line.

src: The younger Pretorius elevated Kruger to the rank of commandant.
mt: 年轻的普雷托里乌斯把克鲁格提升为指挥官.
ref: 年轻的普雷托里乌斯 （ Pretorius ） 将克鲁格 （ Kruger ） 提升为指挥官。
dipper_l80_o40: Pretorius Junior had made Kruger a commandant.

src: Marcus Claudius M. f. M. n. Marcellus, consul in 183 BC.
mt: 马库斯 · 克劳迪乌斯 · 马赛卢斯 ， 公元前 183 年领事。
ref: Marcus Claudius M. f. M. n. Marcellus ， 公元前 183 年的执政官。
dipper_l80_o40: M. F. M. N. Marcellus, consul in 183 B. C.

src: The Royal Ulster Constabulary also used the M1 carbine.
mt: 皇家乌尔斯特警察部队也使用了 M1 卡宾枪.
ref: 皇家阿尔斯特警察局也使用了 M1 卡宾枪。
dipper_l80_o40: The M1 carbine was also used by the Royal Ulster Constabulary.

src: On December 24, the storm dissipated after striking Mindanao.
mt: 12 月 24 日, 暴风雨在袭击棉兰老后消散了.
ref: 12 月 24 日 ， 暴风雨袭击棉兰老岛后消散。
dipper_l80_o40: On the 24th, the cyclone dissipated after striking Mindanao.

src: But the corset cover, a "boxlike armour of whalebone and pink cordage," poked out from under gown, and this time she called Marie, her personal maid.
mt: 但是皮带的封面 ， 一个 "白兰骨和粉红色警戒线的盒式盔甲" ， 从礼服底下掏出来 ， 这次她叫玛丽 ， 她的私人女仆。
ref: 但紧身胸衣的罩衣 ， “一件用鲸骨和粉色绳索做成的箱状盔甲 ” 从长袍下探了出来 ， 这一次她叫来了她的私人女仆玛丽。
dipper_l80_o40: She called Marie, her personal maid.

src: He frequently depicted the birds' nests and eggs, and occasionally natural predators, such as snakes.
mt: 他经常描绘出鸟巢和鸟蛋 ， 有时还描绘出蛇等天然捕食者。
ref: 他经常描绘鸟的巢和卵 ， 偶尔描绘自然的掠食者 ， 例如蛇。
dipper_l80_o40: He often portrayed birds’ nests and eggs, and sometimes their natural enemies, such as snakes.

src: He travelled to the United States, where he played golf, raced powerboats, and drove his Aston Martin around the West Coast.
mt: 他去了美国 ， 在那里打高尔夫球 ， 赛跑动力船 ， 并驾驶他的阿斯顿马丁环绕西海岸。
ref: 他去了美国 ， 在那里打高尔夫球 ， 参加摩托艇比赛 ， 并驾驶他的阿斯顿马丁号环游西海岸。
dipper_l80_o40: He went to the United States, where he played golf, raced motorboats, and drove his Aston Martin along the West Coast.

src: Complex compositions visualised the back and forth of fighting for the viewer.
mt: 复杂的构图让人联想到为观众而战的来回.
ref: 复杂的构图使观众看到了战斗的来回过程。
dipper_l80_o40: The complex compositions of the battles were portrayed in a way that was easy to understand.

src: Eventually, the office of pontifex maximus became a de facto consular prerogative.
mt: 最后 ， 马恩岛最高酋长办公室成为事实上的领事特权。
ref: 最终 ， 教皇的职位成为事实上的领事特权。
dipper_l80_o40: The pontiff’s office was a de facto consular prerogative.

src: French's diary and memoirs omit mention of this telegram.
mt: 法国的日记和回忆录没有提到这份电报.
ref: 法国的日记和回忆录没有提到这份电报。

src: Then she sailed once under Captain Davies to Jamaica.
mt: 然后她在戴维斯船长的指挥下航行了一次到牙买加.
ref: 然后 ， 她曾在戴维斯船长的带领下航行到牙买加。

src: Guthorm then slays Sigurd in his bed, but Sigurd kills him before dying.
mt: 古瑟姆然后在床上杀了西古尔德 ， 但西古尔德在死前就杀了他。
ref: Guthorm 随后在床上杀死了 Sigurd ， 但 Sigurd 在死前也杀死了他。
dipper_l80_o40: Sigurd was slain in his bed, but he slew Guthram before he died.

src: Ruler of Italy since 493, Theoderic became king of the Visigoths in 511 and exerted hegemony over the Vandals in North Africa between 521 and 523.
mt: 自 493 年以来 ， 意大利统治者西奥德里克于 511 年成为维希戈特人的国王 ， 并在 521 年至 523 年期间对北非的破坏者实行霸权。
ref: Theoderic 自 493 年起成为意大利的统治者 ， 于 511 年成为西哥特人的国王 ， 并在 521 年至 523 年之间霸占了北非的 Vandals 。
dipper_l80_o40: Theodoric, who had been king of the Visigoths since 511, had been king of the Vandals in Africa from 521 to 523.

src: from Notre Dame, inducted into Pro Hall of Fame in 2016 as a Contributor.
mt: 2016 年从圣母那里被带入名人堂 ， 成为一名贡献者。
ref: 来自圣母大学 ， 2016 年以贡献者身份入选职业名人堂。

src: Musical features included added tone chords, modal inflections, unconventional substitutions, and modulations.
mt: 音乐的特点包括增加音调和弦, 模态折曲, 非常规的替换和调制.

src: When not in battle, it resides in an aquarium with the Ika Origami on Genta's sushi cart.
mt: 如果不在战场上 ， 它就住在 Genta 的寿司车上的一个水族馆里。

mt: 箭头动力学于 1992 年在威廉姆斯堡的布什花园首次推出了德拉钦大火的特写.

src: The ridges and valleys formed when the exposed clay eroded faster than the exposed chalk, greensand, or sandstone.
mt: 当暴露的粘土比暴露的粉笔、绿沙或沙岩侵蚀得更快时 ， 形成了山脊和山谷。

src: Her blindness serves to accentuate the motif of racial blindness throughout the story.
mt: 她的失明加深了整个故事中的种族失明运动.

src: South of Steinkjer NSB operates the Trøndelag Commuter Rail.
mt: Steinkjer NSB 以南有 Tr ø ndelag 通勤铁路。

src: This tradition often aligns with classical functionalism.
mt: 这种传统往往与传统的功能主义相一致.

src: They acquired shortstop Orlando Cabrera and first baseman Doug Mientkiewicz in this trade.
mt: 他们在这次交易中获得了奥兰多卡夫雷拉和一垒手 Doug Mientkiewicz.

dipper_l80_o40: In this deal, the Cubs acquired shortstop Orlando Cabrera and first baseman Doug Mientkiewicz.

src: Meanwhile, Alex walks into her lair with Aria and Noel's files.
mt: 与此同时 ， 亚历克斯带着阿里娅和诺埃尔的档案走进了她的巢穴。

src: Gapan commemorates their major industry with the Tsinelas Festival on the anniversary of their cityhood.
mt: 加潘在城市成立周年纪念日庆祝他们的主要产业 - - 齐尼拉斯节。
ref: 加潘在建市周年纪念日以举办拖鞋节来纪念他们的主要产业。

src: The narcotic lowers the victim's inhibitions while dulling the pain of the vampire's bite.
mt: 麻醉剂降低了受害者的抑制作用, 同时减轻了吸血鬼咬伤的痛苦.

src: Then, the branches extend from the nodes and leafing out occurs.
mt: 然后, 树枝从节点延伸到树叶外.
ref: 然后 ， 枝条从节点处延伸出来 ， 并开始长出叶子。

src: It contains around 300 headstones, many of which predate the current church.
mt: 它有大约 300 块墓碑 ， 其中许多是在现在的教堂之前。

src: The Soviet Union repatriated 847 Finns after the War.
mt: 战后, 苏联遣返了 847 名芬兰人.
ref: 战后 ， 苏联遣返了 847 名芬兰人。
dipper_l80_o40: After the war, the Soviet Union repatriated 847 Finns.

src: The fashions during this time consisted of the cloak, tunic, trousers, leggings, and accessories.
mt: 这一时期的时尚包括斗篷、调谐、裤子、腿和配件.

src: Chalcogens also bond with other pnictogens, such as arsenic, antimony, and bismuth.

src: Contrastingly his supporters compare Berlusconismo to French Gaullism and Argentinian Peronism.

ref: 相反 ， 他的支持者将贝卢斯科尼主义比作法国的戴高乐主义和阿根廷的庇隆主义。

src: Principal ore minerals are chalcopyrite and sphalerite, which occur with pyrrhotite, pyrite, and quartz.
mt: 主要的矿石矿物是黄铜矿和闪石, 它们与硬铁矿、黄铁矿和石英有关.

src: Acetylation effectively changes the free hydroxyls within wood into acetyl groups.
mt: 丙烯酸化有效地将木材中的游离羟基转化为乙酰基.
ref: 乙酰化作用有效地将木材中的游离羟基转化为乙酰基。

src: Hanoi Agreement between Cambodia and Viet Nam on Waterway Transportation, 13 December 1998.
mt: 柬埔寨和越南关于水道运输的河内协定 ， 1998 年 12 月 13 日。

dipper_l80_o40: The Hanoi Agreement between Cambodia and Vietnam on the Use of Waterways, signed in Hanoi on 13 December 1998, was a major step towards the establishment of a Cambodian-Vietnamese economic community.

src: The Battlestar Galactica miniseries displays an original model Centurion on display in Galactica's museum hangar.

src: This provokes Caiaphas to tear his own robe in anger and to accuse Jesus of blasphemy.
mt: 这引起了卡亚普愤怒地撕破他自己的长袍 ， 指责耶稣亵渎神。

src: The superior vena cava drains blood from above the diaphragm and empties into the upper back part of the right atrium.

src: Scott knocks Cheryl into the cellar and locks her inside.
mt: 斯科特把谢丽尔撞到地窖里 ， 把她锁在里面。
ref: 斯科特 （ Scott ） 将谢丽尔 （ Cheryl ） 撞到地窖中 ， 并将她锁在里面。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he pushed her into the cellar and locked her in.

src: After pausing at Monmouth Court House, Clinton began to push westwards.
mt: 克林顿在蒙茅斯法院停下脚步后开始向西推进。
ref: 克林顿在蒙茅斯法院停下脚步后开始向西推进。
dipper_l80_o40: After a halt at Monmouth Court-House, Clinton pushed on westward.

src: Vija Artmane, 79, Latvian actress, complications from strokes.
mt: 79 岁的 Vija Artmane ， 拉脱维亚女演员 ， 中风并发症。
ref: 79 岁的 Vija Artmane ， 拉脱维亚女演员 ， 中风并发症。
dipper_l80_o40: Virg Artmane, 79, Latvian actress, complications from strokes.

src: They passed through desert terrain into oak savanna in June, often camping and sleeping under large oaks.
mt: 6 月份 ， 他们穿过沙漠地形进入橡树草原 ， 经常在大橡树下露营和睡觉。
ref: 6 月份 ， 他们穿过沙漠地形进入橡树草原 ， 经常在大橡树下露营和睡觉。
dipper_l80_o40: In June they crossed the desert and reached the oak-woods. They often camped and slept under the great oaks.

src: They are normally equipped with heavy armour, shields, and lances on barded elven steeds.
mt: 他们通常配备重型盔甲、盾牌和带刺精钢的鱼叉.
ref: 他们通常配备重型盔甲、盾牌和长矛。
dipper_l80_o40: They are usually armed with heavy armor, shields, and lances, and they ride elven steeds with a bridle.

src: They differ from dark milds and old ales in the use of roast grains, which adds to the bitterness, and lends flavours of toast, biscuit or coffee.
mt: 在使用烤肉时 ， 它们不同于黑麦和旧啤酒 ， 这增加了苦味 ， 并借出了吐司、饼干或咖啡的味道。
ref: 在使用烤肉时 ， 它们不同于黑麦和旧啤酒 ， 这增加了苦味 ， 并借出了吐司、饼干或咖啡的味道。
dipper_l80_o40: The roasted malts used in the brewing of these beers give them a bitter taste and a toasted, biscuity, or coffee-like flavor.

src: Wolves may encounter striped hyenas in Israel, Central Asia and India, usually in disputes over carcasses.
mt: 狼可能在以色列、中亚和印度遇到条纹的透明质动物 ， 通常是在尸体纠纷中。
ref: 狼可能在以色列、中亚和印度遇到条纹的鬣狗科 ， 通常是在尸体纠纷中。
dipper_l80_o40: In Israel, Central Asia, and India, wolves and hyenas meet, usually in the course of a dispute over a carcass.

src: The Snitchers ride around the desert, ambushing good citizens and stealing their belongings.
mt: 这些偷猎者在沙漠中游荡, 伏击好人, 偷走他们的财物.
ref: 这些偷猎者在沙漠中游荡 ， 伏击良好公民 ， 并偷走他们的财物。
dipper_l80_o40: The snatchers ride about the desert, and rob the good citizens of their property.

src: In the spring, Santals celebrate holi when they drench each other with colours.
mt: 春天, 桑托斯庆祝霍利, 他们用颜色互相浸水.
ref: 在春天 ， 桑塔尔人庆祝胡里节 ， 人们往彼此身上洒满色彩。
dipper_l80_o40: In the spring, the Santals celebrate Holi, the festival of colours.

src: Greyhound Lines operates the Long Beach Station in Long Beach.
mt: 灰狗队在长滩上经营长滩站.
ref: 灰狗队在长滩上经营长滩站。
dipper_l80_o40: Greyhound has a station in Long Beach.

src: Most of these eruptions and therefore most of the volcano, consist of lava flows with little tephra.
mt: 其中大部分喷发 ， 因此大部分火山是由岩浆流组成的 ， 几乎没有台风。
ref: 大部分的这些喷发 ， 因此也是大部分的火山 ， 都是由熔岩流组成的 ， 很少有火山喷发碎屑。
dipper_l80_o40: The lava flows of the volcano are largely composed of ash-free lava.

src: When Howard makes a thorough examination of the recovered burros and packs, he finds two bags of placer gold overlooked by the thieves.
mt: 霍华德仔细检查了回收的毛刺和袋子 ， 发现两袋被窃贼忽略的安放金子。
ref: 当霍华德对找回的驴子和背包进行彻底检查时 ， 他发现了两袋被小偷忽略了的的砂金。
dipper_l80_o40: When the scouts had inspected the reclaimed donkeys and packs, they found two bags of gold dust that had been left behind by the robbers.

src: Leoonard defeated Frank Kirke on November 28, 1917 in a stunning first round knockout at Stockyards Stadium in Denver.
mt: 1917 年 11 月 28 日 ， 莱昂纳德在丹佛斯托克达斯球场的第一轮击球比赛中击败了弗兰克 · 柯克。
ref: 1917 年 11 月 28 日 ， 在丹佛的斯托克亚德体育场 ， 伦纳德在第一轮的淘汰赛中就击败了弗兰克 · 柯克。
dipper_l80_o40: On November 28, 1917, in the Stockyards, in Denver, he knocked out Frank Kirke in the first round.

src: The Cubs traded Barrett to the Padres, and later acquired catcher Jason Kendall from Oakland.
mt: 小熊把巴雷特卖给了帕德雷斯, 后来又从奥克兰收购了捕鱼手杰森. 肯德尔.
ref: 小熊队把巴雷特卖给了帕德雷斯 ， 后来又从奥克兰收购了捕鱼手杰森. 肯德尔。
dipper_l80_o40: The Cubs traded him to the Padres and later acquired catcher Jason Kendall from Oakland.

src: She also observed battleships bombarding Ponape on 1 May.
mt: 她还观察到 5 月 1 日有战舰轰炸 Ponape 。
ref: 5 月 1 日 ， 她还观察到战舰对波纳普的轰炸。
dipper_l80_o40: On the 1st of May, she saw the battleships bombarding Ponape.

src: One can notice the decoratively designed gate, the pediments above middle windows, the balcony with its adorned balustrade.
mt: 人们可以注意到装饰设计的大门 ， 中间窗户上方的花瓣 ， 阳台及其装饰的阳台。
ref: 人们可以注意到装饰设计的大门 ， 中间窗户上方的花瓣 ， 阳台及其装饰的阳台。
dipper_l80_o40: The gate, the pediments above the windows, the balcony with its carved balustrade, all these are a source of delight.

src: Eaton pinned Douglas after Jim Cornette hits Douglas with his tennis racket.
mt: 在吉姆 · 科内特用网球拍打道格拉斯之后, 伊顿用针刺了道格拉斯.
ref: 吉姆 · 科尔内特用网球拍击打道格拉斯后 ， 伊顿盯上了道格拉斯。
dipper_l80_o40: Eaton threw down his opponent, and Cornette smashed him with his racket.

src: Captain America notices a gem hanging on Loki's neck, and smashes it with his shield.
mt: 美国上尉注意到一个挂在洛基脖子上的宝石, 用他的盾牌砸碎了它.
ref: 美国队长注意到洛基脖子上挂着一颗宝石 ； 然后美国队长用他的盾牌将宝石砸碎。
dipper_l80_o40: Captain America noticed a jewel hanging around Loki’s neck and smashed it with his shield.

src: In the end, Scarlett finds her, and after a few taunts from Baroness, Scarlett beats Baroness and recovers the Prime Minister.
mt: 最后 ， 斯佳丽找到了她 ， 经过男爵夫人的几次嘲弄 ， 斯佳丽战胜了男爵夫人 ， 收复了首相。
ref: 最后 ， 斯嘉丽找到了她 ， 在男爵夫人的一番奚落之后 ， 斯嘉丽击败了男爵夫人 ， 救回了首相。
dipper_l80_o40: Scarlett, who had been looking for her, at last found her. The Baroness had been taunting her, but Scarlett had beaten her and rescued the Prime Minister.

src: In Batman #3 she wears a fur mask and again succeeds in escaping Batman.
mt: 在 3 号蝙蝠侠中, 她戴着皮毛面具, 又成功地逃脱了蝙蝠侠.
ref: 在《蝙蝠侠 3 》中 ， 她戴着毛皮面具 ， 再次成功地从蝙蝠侠手中逃脱。
dipper_l80_o40: In the third issue of Batman, she wore a fur mask and again escaped from Batman.

src: Tartar, with salt and pepper, served on dark rye bread, topped with raw onion rings, grated horseradish and a raw egg yolk.
mt: 鞑靼用盐和胡椒粉制成的黑黑麦面包 ， 上面有生洋葱圈、烤马铃薯和生蛋黄。
ref: 鞑靼用盐和胡椒粉制成的黑黑麦面包 ， 上面有生洋葱圈、烤马铃薯和生蛋黄。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he ate a savoury dish of fried herrings, a savoury savoury of herrings, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried smelts, fried herrings, fried herrings, fried herrings, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried eel, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, fried savouries, sliced fried eggs, and sliced ham.

src: An anime adaptation by Sunrise debuted on TV Tokyo on April 4, 2006.
mt: 2006 年 4 月 4 日在东京电视上首映的日出动画改编.
ref: 2006 年 4 月 4 日 ， 在东京电视上首映的日出动画改编。
dipper_l80_o40: Sunrise aired an animated version of the story on April 4, 2006.

src: Roman satirists ever after referred to the year as "the consulship of Julius and Caesar."
mt: 罗马讽刺家后来把这一年称为 "朱利叶斯和凯撒的领馆" 。
ref: 此后 ， 罗马的讽刺作家将这一年称为 “朱利叶斯和凯撒的执政期 ” 。
dipper_l80_o40: The Roman satirists referred to this year as the year of the consulship of Julius and Caesar.

src: First Indian cricketer to score three successive centuries in ODIs.
mt: 第一个连续三个世纪在 ODI 中得分的印度板球运动员.
ref: 第一位连续三个世纪在 ODIs 上得分的印度板球运动员。
dipper_l80_o40: The first Indian to score three centuries in a row in the one-day format.

src: Converts to evangelical Christianity from Roman Catholicism
mt: 从罗马天主教改信福音基督教的人
ref: 从罗马天主教皈依福音基督教
dipper_l80_o40: Converts from Roman Catholicism to Evangelical Christianity

src: The Gauls met comprehensive defeat by the Roman legions under Papus and Regulus.
mt: 高尔人在帕普斯和拉古斯统治下遭到罗马军团的全面失败.
ref: 高卢人被帕帕斯和雷古勒斯领导的罗马军团彻底击败。
dipper_l80_o40: The Romans under the command of Papus and Regulus defeated the Gauls.

src: Later LSIs and those being refitted were provisioned with luffing davits of a crossbeam type.
mt: 后来 ， 向 LSI 和被重新发射的 LSI 提供了一种横梁式的光栅。
ref: 后来的 LSI 和那些正在改装的 LSI 都配备了横梁式的变幅吊柱。
dipper_l80_o40: The later LSIs and those that were refitted were equipped with luffing davits of the cross-beam type.

src: Eärnil's army descended on the unprepared Wainriders, driving many of them into the swamplands of the Dead Marshes.
mt: 埃尼尔的军队落在了没有准备好的 Wainriders 身上 ， 他们中的许多人被赶进了死沼泽地的沼泽地。
ref: 艾尼尔的军队向毫无准备的温瑞德人进攻 ， 将许多温瑞德人赶到了死亡沼泽。
dipper_l80_o40: Then the swarm of Earnil’s men rushed upon the unprepared Wainriders, and many of them were thrown into the marshy bogs of the Dead Marshes.

src: Suppose their Mediterranean Fleet pours through the Straits of Gibraltar, and moves in to the Atlantic, or the Channel or even into the North Sea.
mt: 假设他们的地中海舰队经过直布罗陀海峡 ， 进入大西洋或海峡 ， 甚至进入北海。
ref: 假设他们的地中海舰队通过直布罗陀海峡 ， 进入大西洋 ， 或英吉利海峡 ， 甚至进入北海。
dipper_l80_o40: ‘But what if their Mediterranean fleet were to pass through the Straits of Gibraltar and enter the Atlantic, or the Channel, or even the North Sea?’

src: Its mixed tenants included artists, merchants, watchmakers, surveyors, and most of all, solicitors and barristers.
mt: 它的混合租户包括艺术家、商人、手表制作人、测量师 ， 最重要的是律师和律师。
ref: 里面住着各样的租户 ， 包括艺术家、商人、手表制作人、测量师 ， 最主要的是事务律师和诉讼律师。
dipper_l80_o40: The occupants of the house were a motley lot, comprising artists, merchants, watchmakers, surveyors, and above all, lawyers and attorneys.

src: The genera Valenictus and Odobenus developed elongated tusks.
mt: 瓦伦尼图斯和奥多贝努斯属发育了长长的图斯.
ref: 壮海象和海象属发育了长长的獠牙。
dipper_l80_o40: Valenictus and Odobenus had tusks that were elongated.

src: Bertilak dismounts and in the ensuing fight kills the boar.
mt: 贝蒂拉克下车了, 在随后的战斗中, 野猪被杀了.
ref: 贝尔蒂拉克 （ Bertilak ） 下马 ， 并在随后的战斗中杀死了野猪。
dipper_l80_o40: Then the pig rushed at Bertilak, who dismounted and killed it.

src: The alpine poppy and purple mountain saxifrage both thrive up to a very great height.
mt: 高山的罂粟和紫色的山地的树苗都在非常高的高度上蓬勃发展.
ref: 阿尔卑斯山罂粟和紫色山地虎耳草都能茁壮成长到非常高的高度。
dipper_l80_o40: The alpine poppy and the purple saxifrage grow at a very high altitude.

src: He died on 5 May 1821, after confession, Extreme Unction and Viaticum in the presence of Father Ange Vignali.
mt: 1821 年 5 月 5 日 ， 在 Ange Vignali 神父在场的情况下 ， 他在认罪、极端解脱和维亚蒂库姆之后死亡。
ref: 他于 1821 年 5 月 5 日在安热 · 维纳利神父面前忏悔、涂抹圣油和祈祷后去世。
dipper_l80_o40: He died on the 5th of May, after having confessed, received the anointing, and the Viaticum, in the presence of the Abbé Ange Vignali.

src: Lunacy & the Arrangement of Books, New Castle, Del.
mt: 午餐 & 安排书籍 ， 新堡 ， 德尔市。
ref: 《精神错乱与图书编排》 ， 纽卡斯尔 ， 删除。
dipper_l80_o40: New Castle, Del.

src: Very sorrowfully Morrison had to superintend his interment on a mountainside.
mt: 莫里森不得不在山坡上监督他的干预行动.
ref: 非常悲哀的是 ， 莫里森不得不监督他在山坡上的安葬。
dipper_l80_o40: Morrison had to supervise his burial on a mountainside.

src: Like in Malwa, however, Akbar entered into a dispute with his vassals over the conquest of Gondwana.
mt: 但是 ， 就像在 Malwa 一样 ， Akbar 与他的同伙在征服 Gondwana 的问题上发生了争执。
ref: 但是 ， 就像在 Malwa 一样 ， Akbar 与他的同伙在征服 Gondwana 的问题上发生了争执。
dipper_l80_o40: But the same thing happened in Gondwana as in Malwa. Akbar and his commanders argued about the best way to conquer the kingdom.

src: Tunny found the enemy biplanes a great nuisance, since her radar detected them late or not at all.
mt: 通妮发现敌人的双机非常讨厌 ， 因为她的雷达发现它们很晚或根本没有。
ref: Tunny 发现敌人的双翼飞机是个很大的麻烦 ， 因为她的雷达很晚才探测到它们 ， 或者根本就没有探测到。
dipper_l80_o40: The enemy's biplanes were a great nuisance to Tunny, whose radio-locator failed to detect them at all or only very late.

src: For Hermann Keller, the running quavers and semiquavers "suffuse the setting with health and strength."
mt: 对赫尔曼 · 凯勒来说 ， 跑步的跳跃者和半跳跃者 "让环境充满健康和力量" 。
ref: 对赫尔曼 · 凯勒来说 ， 跑步的跳跃者和半跳跃者 "让环境充满健康和力量" 。
dipper_l80_o40: Hermann Keller said that the running quavers and semiquavers "suffuse the setting with health and strength."

src: He berated the French's poor Arabic grammar and the infelicitous style of their proclamations.
mt: 他对法国人糟糕的阿拉伯语语法和他们无礼的宣告方式表示赞叹.
ref: 他痛斥法国人蹩脚的阿拉伯语语法和他们不恰当的宣告风格。
dipper_l80_o40: He criticized the French for their poor Arabic grammar and the incongruous style of their proclamations.

src: Selective 5HT reuptake inhibitors in psychiatric disorders.
mt: 在精神疾病中选择性 5HT 再吸收抑制剂。
ref: 选择性 5HT 再摄取抑制剂在精神疾病中的应用。
dipper_l80_o40: The selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors in psychiatric disorders.

src: Senator William Morris Stewart of Nevada in the 1953 episode "The Bandits of Panamint."
mt: 内华达州参议员威廉 · 莫里斯 · 斯图尔特在 1953 年的《巴拿马匪徒》一集中.
ref: 内华达州参议员威廉 · 莫里斯 · 斯图尔特在 1953 年的《巴拿马匪徒》一集中。
dipper_l80_o40: The episode was titled “The Bandits of Panamint.”

src: These were the first incarnations of the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy franchise.
mt: 这些都是希奇克指南的第一个化身 - - 银河专营权.
ref: 这些是《银河系漫游指南》系列的第一部。
dipper_l80_o40: The first of the Hitchhiker’s Guides to the Galaxy.

src: And a rise of unrighteousness then I manifest Myself!
mt: 不义的兴起, 我便显明了自己!
ref: 不义的兴起 ， 我便显明了自己 ！
dipper_l80_o40: And when the unrighteousness rises, I will manifest Myself!

src: Air Time scored 47 in his first out with Renato Nunes.
mt: 在第一次和雷纳托 · 纽斯的比赛中, 空时获得了 47 分.
ref: 在与 Renato Nunes 的首场比赛中 ， Air Time 得分 47 。
dipper_l80_o40: In his first game with Renato Nunes, Air Time scored a 47.

src: Incoming freshman commemorate their new beginning by tossing a gold medallion into the fountain.
mt: 即将到来的新生通过向喷泉投掷一枚金牌来纪念他们的新开端.
ref: 即将到来的新生通过向喷泉投掷一枚金牌来纪念他们的新开端。
dipper_l80_o40: The new students, as a token of their new beginning, throw a gold medallion into the fountain.

src: During the day, Johnston bowled the most overs, 30.
mt: 在这一天里, 约翰斯顿踢得最多, 30 分.
ref: 在这一天里 ， 约翰斯顿投球最多 ， 共 30 个。
dipper_l80_o40: During the day Johnston bowled the most overs, thirty.

src: The Gamecocks' defense stuffed the Badgers and they turned the ball over on downs.
mt: 加梅克人的防守充斥着巴杰斯人 ， 他们把球颠倒过来。
ref: 加梅克人的防守充斥着巴杰斯人 ， 他们把球颠倒过来。
dipper_l80_o40: The Badgers were unable to get the ball past the South Carolina line and were forced to punt.

src: Venom infiltrates Ravencroft prison seeking Carnage and absorbs the Carnage Symbiote.
mt: 毒液渗入拉文克罗夫特监狱寻找屠杀并吸收屠杀符号.
ref: 毒液渗入拉文克罗夫特监狱寻找屠杀 ， 并吸收屠杀共生体。
dipper_l80_o40: Venom penetrates Ravencroft prison in search of Carnage and absorbs the Carnage symbiote.

src: Euclid developed proofs for the Pythagorean Theorem, for the infinitude of primes, and worked on the five Platonic solids.
mt: 欧几里德为毕达哥兰定理 ， 为无穷大的底物开发了证据 ， 并研究了五个柏拉图固体。
ref: 欧几里德为毕达哥兰定理 ， 为无穷大的底物开发了证据 ， 并研究了五个柏拉图固体。
dipper_l80_o40: Euclid developed proofs of the Pythagorean theorem, of the infinity of prime numbers, and of the five Platonic solids.

src: The fox, stumped, asked the pigeon where it learnt such a retort.
mt: 狐狸绊倒了, 问鸽子是在哪里学到这种反驳的.
ref: 狐狸绊倒了 ， 问鸽子是在哪里学到这种反驳的。
dipper_l80_o40: The fox, astonished, asked the pigeon where he had learned such a reply.

src: Frances Bartkowski, a scholar of English, named Callie in her puberty as a chimera.
mt: 英国学者弗朗西斯? 巴特科夫斯基 (Frances Bartkowski) 在青春期被称为 "黑猩猩" (chimera).

src: The Longhorns forced three turnovers, including two interceptions, without surrendering any themselves.

src: Other merozoites develop into immature gametocytes, which are the precursors of male and female gametes.

src: After bidding farewell, she departs again on December 28, 2007.

src: Mark Twain's gross libel against Ament utterly false.

src: However, apparently, he taught in his sermon that repentance precedes faith, a tenet, not of Calvinism, but of Arminianism.

src: In July 1916, Kinkaid reported to, the navy's newest battleship, as a gunfire spotter.

src: During the Magnetic North storyline, Dazzler and Warren go to the Triskelion in an attempt to rescue Polaris.

src: Two other demos produced with Harrison titled "Clap Your Hands" and "What Can I Say" also leaked.

src: 'A Cellist,' painted by Miguel Zaragoza, hangs as its pendant across the room above the sofa.

src: The battalion consists of approximately 50 officers and NCOs, and 150 privates and corporals.

src: In 1918, anglers were regularly catching catfish, shorthead redhorse, suckers, and yellow perch in Euclid Creek.

ref: 1918 年 ， 垂钓者经常在欧几里得河捕捉鲶鱼、短头红马鱼、鲈鱼和黄鲈鱼。
dipper_l80_o40: In the year 1918, the Euclid Creek was a favorite fishing place for catfish, shortheads, suckers, and yellow perch.

src: She reached the semifinals by defeating Julie Coin, Stefanie Vögele and Jill Craybas, then lost in the semifinal to Tamarine Tanasugarn.
mt: 她在半决赛中击败了朱莉 · 科因、斯蒂芬妮 · 弗格莱和吉尔 · 克雷巴斯 ， 然后在半决赛中输给了塔马琳 · 塔纳苏加尔恩。

src: On exhalation, the emu's cold nasal turbinates condense moisture back out of the air and absorb it for reuse.
mt: 在呼气时 ， 伊木的冷鼻涡轮凝结空气中的水分并吸收用于再利用。

dipper_l80_o40: The cold turbinates of the emu's nose condense the moisture in the air as it exhales, and absorb it for re-use.

src: Bangladesh's batsmen struggled in unfamiliar conditions and the team slumped to two innings defeats.

mt: 紧接着水渠路之后, 铁路横过科罗拉多河水渠的地下通道.

src: One Khmer Rouge takes out his stick grenade and lobs it at the checkpoint's guardhouse.
mt: 一名红色高棉拿出他的手榴弹 ， 并在检查站的守卫室用手榴弹进行游说。
ref: 一名红色高棉拿出他的手榴弹 ， 并在检查站的守卫室用手榴弹进行游说。

mt: 一场 88 米的追逐从阿波马托克斯河到西南面.
ref: 随后在西南部的 Appomattox 河上追赶了 88 英里。
dipper_l80_o40: The pursuit continued for a distance of 88 miles southwestward along the Appomattox River.

src: He finished the season strongly, with 19 wickets in the last three matches against Queensland, South Australia and Victoria.
mt: 他在最后三场对阵昆士兰、南澳大利亚和维多利亚的比赛中表现出了 19 场。
ref: 他在本赛季表现出色 ， 在与昆士兰州、南澳大利亚州和维多利亚州的最近三场比赛中以 19 个小门完成比赛。
dipper_l80_o40: He finished the season with a flourish, taking 19 wickets in the last three matches against South Australia, Victoria and Queensland.

src: Late on December 14, the tropical depression dissipated near Borneo.
mt: 12 月 14 日下旬, 婆罗洲附近的热带低气压消散了.
ref: 12 月 14 日晚 ， 热带低压在婆罗洲附近消散。
dipper_l80_o40: On the evening of the 14th, the cyclone broke up near Borneo.

src: She often performed Sullivan's songs at her famous Sunday soirées.
mt: 她经常在她著名的星期天乡下表演沙利文的歌曲.
ref: 她经常在她著名的周日晚会上表演沙利文的歌曲。
dipper_l80_o40: At her famous Sunday evenings she often sang Sullivan’s songs.

src: Rodger Doxsey, 62, American physicist and astronomer, cancer.
mt: Rodger Doxsey ， 62 岁 ， 美国物理学家和天文学家 ， 癌症。
ref: 罗杰 · 多克西 ， 62 岁 ， 美国物理学家和天文学家 ， 癌症。

src: The roster consists of 47 freshmen, 37 sophomores, 30 juniors, and 20 seniors.
mt: 该名册由 47 名新生、 37 名大二学生、 30 名青年和 20 名老年人组成。
ref: 名册由 47 名新生、 37 名大二学生、 30 名大三学生和 20 名大四学生组成。
dipper_l80_o40: The list of the students is as follows: 47 freshmen, 37 sophomores, 30 juniors, and 20 seniors.

src: The streets, sidewalks, balconies and windows were thronged with mourners.
mt: 街道、人行道、阳台和窗户上挤满了悼念者。
ref: 街道、人行道、阳台和窗户上挤满了悼念者。
dipper_l80_o40: The streets, the pavements, the balconies, the windows were crowded with people.

src: The hacked up version of Jedi Knight was crashing because it was calling a function off the end of a vtable.
mt: 绝地骑士的破解版因为它在调用一个函数而崩.
ref: 绝地武士的破解版崩溃了，因为它调用了 vtable 结尾的一个函数。
dipper_l80_o40: The hacked version of the Jedi Knight crashed because it was trying to call a function that was no longer in the vtable.

src: Turns out is was presuming that calling IDirect3D::CreateViewport() would return an IDirect3DViewport3, which has additional methods tacked onto the end compared to an IDirect3DViewport, which is what I've implemented.
mt: 结果是假设调用IDirect3D::CreateViewport将返回IDirect3DViewport3,它有额外的方法与IDirect3DViewport相比,这是我已经实现的.
ref: 原来是假设调用 IDirect3D::CreateViewport() 将返回 IDirect3DViewport3，与 IDirect3DViewport 相比，还有别的方法，这就是我实现的。
dipper_l80_o40: I was assuming that calling IDirect3D::CreateViewport would return an IDirect3D::Viewport3, which has some extra methods tacked on to the end of it compared to the IDirect3D::Viewport, which is what I have implemented.

src: To me, this is a pretty big assumption because it is only creating the viewport using a Direct3D object, not a Direct3D3 object.
mt: 对于我来说,这是一个相当大的假设, 因为它只是使用Direct3D对象创建视窗, 而不是Direct3D3对象.
ref: 于我而言，这是一个非常大胆的假设，因为它仅使用 Direct3D 对象创建视口，而非使用 Direct3D3 对象。
dipper_l80_o40: I think this is a big assumption, because the viewport is created with a Direct3D object, not a Direct3D3 object.

src: Now, I get that in practice, IDirectXObject2 is typically a proper superset of IDirectXObject, with no changed function signatures, and new methods only added to the end.
mt: 实际上, IDirectXObject2通常是 IDirectXObject 的一个正确的超集, 没有改变函数签名,
ref: 现在，我明白了，在实践中，IDirectXObject2 通常作为 IDirectXObject 的一个适当的超集，不会改变函数签名，只是在末尾添加了新方法。
dipper_l80_o40: I understand that in practice IDirectXObject2 is a superset of IDirectXObject, with no changes to the function signatures and only new methods added to the end.

src: But this is not universally true; for those cases it matters what interface you are using to create the object in question.
mt: 但这并非普遍的;对于这些情况,您使用的接口是重要的,
ref: 但这种方法并不是万能的；在这些情况下，使用什么接口来创建有问题的对象很重要。
dipper_l80_o40: But this is not always the case. In such cases, it depends on the type of the object you are creating.

src: So anyway, since it does hold true here, to fix it I had to extend my viewport implementation to contain the IDirect3DViewport3 methods so that the call to the new one was valid.
mt: 为了修复这个问题, 我必须扩展我的视窗实现以包含 IDirect3DViewport3 方法,
ref: 无论怎样，由于它在此处确实成立，所以为了修复它，我必须扩展我的 viewport 实现来包含 IDirect3DViewport3 方法，从而使其对新方法的调用表现出有效性。
dipper_l80_o40: So, since it was true, I had to extend my viewport implementation to implement the methods of IDirect3DViewport3 so that the new one could be called.

src: Suppose for the sake of argument that science at least in part consists of lists of objectively factual statements about the world, true apart from any theory they might support.
mt: 假设科学至少部分包含对世界有客观事实陈述的列表, 它们不论支持什么理论都是真实的.
ref: 以讨论为目的，假设科学至少存在一部分由关于世界的客观事实陈述的列表组成，除了其可能支持的任意理论之外，该等陈述皆为事实。
dipper_l80_o40: For the sake of argument, let us suppose that science is a collection of facts, which are true in themselves, independently of any theory.

src: Even if it's true that such facts exist in science it's still possible to argue that scientific facts are theory-laden.
mt: 即使科学中存在这样的事实, 也可以说科学事实充满了理论.
ref: 即使这些事实确实存在于科学之中，仍然有可能认为科学事实是纯理论的。
dipper_l80_o40: Even if it is true that there are such facts in science, it is still possible to say that scientific facts are theory-laden.

src: Scientific facts result from experiments.
mt: 科学事实是实验的结果.
ref: 科学事实源于实验。
dipper_l80_o40: Experimental facts are the facts of science.

src: The experiments don't create the facts on this reading, but the choice of which experiments to conduct controls which facts are discovered.
mt: 实验并不能创造出读数上的事实, 而是选择哪些实验来进行控制哪些事实被发现.
ref: 实验并不创造以上所述事实，但选择进行哪些实验控制了哪些事实会被发现。
dipper_l80_o40: In this view, it is not the experiments that produce the facts, but the choice of experiments that determines which facts are discovered.

src: Some facts, e.g. about subatomic particles, can only result from experiments that are themselves only possible in capitalism because they require too much resources, too much organization, too much coercion, to pull off otherwise.
mt: 实验本身只能在资本主义中实现, 因为它们需要太多的资源,太多的组织,太多的强制,
ref: 一些事实，例如关于亚原子粒子的事实，只能从实验中得出，而这些实验本身只有在资本的支持下才有可能完成，因为它们需要付出大量资源、大量组织的参与、采取大量强制措施，否则就无法成功。
dipper_l80_o40: The discovery of certain facts, such as the discovery of the sub-atomic particle, is only possible under capitalist conditions, because they require too much material, too much organization, too much coercion, to be carried out under any other system.

src: This is a very brief sketch of a plausible argument that theories of capitalism influencing the actual content of science are consistent with theories asserting the existence of objective scientific facts.
mt: 这是一个很简短的概述, 证明资本主义理论影响科学实际内容与主张客观科学事实存在的理论是一致的.
ref: 以下是对一个似是而非的论点的简述，即资本主义影响科学实际内容的理论与断言客观科学事实存在的理论具有一致性。
dipper_l80_o40: This is a very brief sketch of a plausible argument that theories of the influence of capital on the content of science are compatible with theories of the objective existence of scientific facts.

src: It's *not* an argument in favor of the existence of objective scientific facts, which I don't believe in.
mt: 这不是一个支持客观科学事实存在的论点,
ref: 这 *并非* 一个支持客观科学事实存在的论点，我不相信这一论点。
dipper_l80_o40: I am not arguing for the existence of objective scientific facts, in which I do not believe.

src: Going to be my first project car.
mt: 这将是我第一个项目车.
ref: 它将是我第一辆项目车。
dipper_l80_o40: My first car.

src: Picking this up this weekend.
mt: 接下来这个周末.
ref: 我这个周末来取它。
dipper_l80_o40: This is the one I'll be getting this weekend.

src: I was looking for a good first car guy car; and I really love the 80s aesthetic.
mt: 我正在寻找一辆好车, 我真的很喜欢80年代的美学.
ref: 我正在寻找将与我朝夕相处的第一辆车；我确实非常喜欢 80 年代的审美观。
dipper_l80_o40: I was looking for a good first car for a young man. I like the eighties style.

src: Already on coil overs and lowered ride height.
mt: 已经在卷轴上转动, 降低了行驶高度.
ref: 已经在盘旋并降低了行驶高度。
dipper_l80_o40: The suspension was already on coil springs and the height was lowered.

src: I've done a little research but I would love if anyone has any info about this car.
mt: 我做了一些研究, 但如果有人知道这辆车的信息,
ref: 我做过研究的，不过，如果谁能提供任何关于这辆车的信息，我会非常感激。
dipper_l80_o40: I have done some research, but I would be very grateful if anyone could give me any information about this car.

src: Personal experiences?
mt: 个人经历?
ref: 个人体验？
dipper_l80_o40: Personal experience?

src: I know they're not fast compared
mt: 我知道他们不是快速的比较
ref: 我知道相比之下它们的速度并不是很快
dipper_l80_o40: I know they are not quick, compared with the others.

src: #Venting into the Fediverse time.
mt: 透到"宇宙时间"中.
ref: #在 Fediverse 中发泄。
dipper_l80_o40: Venting into the Fediverse.

src: The Domestic Partner and I went to the liquor store tonight for some beers and a bottle of bub.
mt: 家庭合伙人和我今晚去酒店买了一些酒和一瓶泡酒.
ref: 我和我的同居伙伴今晚去酒类专卖店买了些啤酒和一瓶起泡酒。
dipper_l80_o40: The Domestic Helper and I went to the liquor store to buy a few beers and a bottle of champagne.

src: When we went to check out, the cashier is a fairly obvious #trans woman.
mt: 收银员是个明显的跨性别女性.
ref: 我们去结账的时候，发现收银员明显是一位#跨性别女性。
dipper_l80_o40: When we went to pay, the cashier was a transvestite of a fairly obvious kind.

src: Me, in board shorts and a wife beater, and The Domestic Partner, all tatted up and with a new haircut that he himself described as "making me look like a neo-nazi".
mt: 我穿着短打, 和"家庭伙伴"全身纹身,
ref: 我穿着冲浪短裤和背心，还有我的同居伙伴，都打扮了，剪了新发型，他自己形容，这样的打扮“让我看起来像个新纳粹主义分子”。
dipper_l80_o40: I was wearing a pair of shorts and a polo shirt, and my husband was a neo-Nazi with a new haircut.

src: Her body immediately stiffened and there was this look of fear in her eyes.
mt: 她的身体立刻变得硬,她的眼睛里面有着恐惧的表情.
ref: 她的身体立即僵硬，她的眼睛里有这种恐惧的表情。
dipper_l80_o40: Her whole body froze, and her eyes widened with terror.

src: There is significant evidence that real-world communication cannot be reduced to sending signals with context-independent meaning.
mt: 有大量证据表明,现实世界中的沟通不能简化为发送具有上下文独立意义的信号.
ref: 大量证据表明，现实世界的通信不能简单认定为发送与背景毫无关联的信号。
dipper_l80_o40: There is ample evidence that the meaning of a message cannot be reduced to a signal independent of the context.

src: In this work, based on a variant of the classical Lewis (1969) signaling model, we explore the conditions for the emergence of context-dependent communication in a situated scenario.
mt: 在这项基于经典的路易斯 (1969) 信号模型的变体的研究中,我们探讨了在某种情境下出现的情境依赖性通信的条件.
ref: 在本研究中，我们以一个经典的刘易斯（1969）信号模型的变体为基础，对在一个情境场景中出现依赖背景的通信的条件进行了探索。
dipper_l80_o40: In this paper, we use a variant of the Lewis signalling model to study the conditions under which context-dependent communication can arise in a situated setting.

src: In particular, we demonstrate that pressure to minimise the vocabulary size is sufficient for such emergence.
mt: 尤其我们证明,压力是为了尽量减少词汇量,
ref: 特别地，我们通过证据证实，对于此现象的出现，最小化词汇量的压力就已足够。
dipper_l80_o40: We show that the pressure to reduce the size of the vocabulary is sufficient to produce this emergence.

src: At the same time, we study the environmental conditions and cognitive capabilities that enable contextual disambiguation of symbol meanings.
mt: 同时,我们研究环境条件和认知能力,
ref: 与此同时，环境条件和认知能力在符号意义方面使语境出现歧义，我们对此进行了研究。
dipper_l80_o40: We are also studying the conditions of the environment and the mental faculties which enable us to disambiguate the meaning of the symbol.

src: We show that environmental constraints on the receiver's referent choice can be unilaterally exploited by the sender, without disambiguation capabilities on the receiver's end.
mt: 我们表明,接收者的参考选择环境约束可以被发送者单方面利用,而接收者端没有明确的功能.
ref: 我们发现，接收者选择所指对象的环境限制可以被发送者单方面利用，而接收者没有消除歧义的能力。
dipper_l80_o40: The sender can exploit the receiver’s choice of referent without the receiver being able to disambiguate.

src: Consistent with common assumptions, the sender's awareness of the context appears to be required for contextual communication.
mt: 根据常见的假设,发送者对上下文的认识似乎是上下文通信所必需的.
ref: 与通常假设一致，发送者对语境的意识似乎是语境通信的必需条件。
dipper_l80_o40: The sender’s awareness of the context is a necessary condition for context-sensitive communication.

src: We suggest that context-dependent communication is a situated multilayered phenomenon, crucially influenced by environment properties such as distribution of contexts.
mt: 我们认为,上下文依赖的沟通是一种多层次的现象,受到环境特征的决定性影响,例如上下文的分布.
ref: 我们认为，依赖语境的通信是一种情景化的多层次现象，受到环境属性如语境分布的重要影响。
dipper_l80_o40: Context-dependent communication is a multilayered phenomenon, influenced by the properties of the environment, such as the distribution of contexts.

src: The model developed in this work is a demonstration of how signals may be ambiguous out of context, but still allow for near-perfect communication accuracy.
mt: 这项工作中开发的模型是如何在外界显示信号时具有模两可的,但仍然允许近乎完美的通信准确性.
ref: 此研究中开发的模型表明，信号在脱离语境的情况下可能是模糊的，但仍然为几近完美的通信精度提供了条件。
dipper_l80_o40: The model developed in this paper shows how a signal can be ambiguous in isolation and yet be almost perfectly precise.

ref: 近 20 年以来，Ashanti Development 一直在与加纳 Ashanti 地区越来越多的社区合作，参与到社区工作中，并在水利、卫生、教育、医疗保健、植树和农业方面提供了支持。

src: There have been a lot of signs of more rodents this past month or so, which has been exceptionally surprising as it's spring and I would have thought they would venture outdoors with the change in weather.
mt: 过去一个月有很多动物出现的迹象, 非常令人惊,

src: Nonetheless, I've had a smattering of plain old snap-traps placed about, and would dutifully replenish the peanut butter on them every few days, as the mice kindly lick it clean.
mt: 我每隔几天就会在上面补充花生, 因为老鼠会它干净.

src: I finally got fed up with this routine last night, cleaned all the traps of peanut butter, and superglued a pistachio to them.

src: I gripe about dad-ification a lot.
mt: 我经常抱怨自己是个父亲.
ref: 我多父亲化这种行为非常抵制。
dipper_l80_o40: I have a lot of complaints about the dadification of things.

src: Here is a (slightly longer than) toot-length crash course in what I mean by dad-ification:
mt: 这里是我指的"爸爸化"的 (略长于) 速成课程:
ref: 以下是关于我所说的“父亲化”的简单概述（略长）：
dipper_l80_o40: Here is a brief (but longer than a toot) explanation of what I mean by “dadification.”

src: It isn't my term, it is a term used to describe when a narrative or gameplay mechanic is built around a central protagonist (usually older, usually male) stewarding or guarding another person (often younger).
mt: 描述故事或游戏机制是围绕一个主要主角 (通常是老年人,通常是男性) 管理或守卫另一个人 (通常是年轻人) 建立的.
ref: 这不是我自己创造的术语，这个术语用来描述叙事或游戏机制围绕一个中心主角（通常是年长的，通常是男性）管理或保护另一个人（通常是年轻的）。
dipper_l80_o40: The term is not mine. It is a term used to describe a game mechanic or a plot device in which the main character (usually older, usually male) is responsible for or guards another character (usually younger).

src: The Last of Us is an easy and canonical example of dad-ification.
mt: 美国的最后一个是简单而正规的爸爸化例子.
ref: 《最后生还者》是一个关于父亲化的经典示例。
dipper_l80_o40: The Last of Us is a simple and canonical example of dadification.

src: Joel uses his skills and ability to enact (extreme) acts of violence to accomplish a task that is coded as "caring."
mt: 乔尔利用自己的技能和能力, 演出 (极端) 的暴力行为,
ref: Joel 利用其技能实施（极端）暴力行为，以完成一项代号为“关爱”的任务。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he sat down and listened to the story.

src: Dad-ification usually posits that the solution to a situation where a parent figure must care for or protect a child or child stand-in is overwhelming strength, and using that strength to force a very specifically shaped power dynamic.
mt: 爸爸化通常假定,一个父母必须照顾或保护孩子或孩子的替代者的情况的解决方案是压倒性的力量,并使用这种力量来强迫一个非常具体的权力动态.
ref: 父亲化一般意味着，在父母必须照顾或保护孩子或弱势人员时，这种方法就屡试不爽，他们使用这种方法强制将自己的这种特定权力凌驾于他人之上。
dipper_l80_o40: The solution to the problem of a parent protecting or caring for a child or a child-like person is usually to use overwhelming strength and to impose a very specific power relationship.

src: Dad-ification erodes the possibility for communal solutions, and often wholly ignores, or undercuts any agency the child has.
mt: 化破坏了共同解决方案的可能性,
ref: 父亲化不仅会削弱集体解决方案的可能性，还经常会完全忽视或削弱孩子的任何能动性。
dipper_l80_o40: Fathering obliterates the possibility of a common solution, and often ignores or suppresses the child’s own agency.

src: In this way, Dad-ification is a stand in for a lot of neoliberal ideals; especially ideas like bootstrapping and self-sufficiency as being an ultimate goal/indicator for success.
mt: 通过这种方式,爸爸化是新自由主义的理想的代名词; 特别是像启动和自给自足这样的想法作为成功的最终目标/指标.
ref: 这样看来，父亲化是许多新自由主义理想的代表；尤其是像自力更生和自给自足作为成功的最终目标/指标这样的想法。
dipper_l80_o40: In this way, dadification is a substitute for many neoliberal ideals, especially the idea of self-sufficiency and self-reliance as the ultimate goal and measure of success.

mt: 让他们留下一个看不见的创伤痕迹.

mt: 尽管布拉姆·斯托克,马克斯·施雷克和斯蒂芬妮·梅耶尽力让他们看起来很糟糕,

src: Been toying with this thought for a little while:

src: Mental health is often seen as something separate from "regular" health.

src: Why?
mt: 为什么?
ref: 为什么？

mt: 因为它发生在心灵中,

src: In truth, the health of your mind, of your brain, is just as much an issue of health as the health of your foot.

src: Intersex is even recognized by TERFs and the like because it's generally more physical and, as such, visible.

src: In the same way that mental health is seen as less "real" than physical health by many, I kind of feel that being trans is merely intersex of the mind.

src: The more I read of studies on sex, gender, psychology, the more the statement of "My sex is male, my gender is female" seems simplistic and inaccurate.
mt: 我越是读到关于性,性别,心理学的研究, 我越觉得"我的性别是男性,我的性别是女性"的说法简单而不准确.
ref: 我读的关于性、性别、心理学的研究越多，“我的性是男，我的性别是女”的说法就越显得简单化和不准确。
dipper_l80_o40: The more I read about sex, gender, psychology, the more I find the statement “I am male, I am female” to be naive and inaccurate.

src: Anyway, load is going up today.
mt: 无论如何,今天的货量将会上升.
ref: 无论如何，今天的负荷会增加。
dipper_l80_o40: “It’s going to be a heavy day today, anyway.”

src: Still feels good.
mt: 感觉还不错.
ref: 感觉还不错。
dipper_l80_o40: It still feels good.

src: I swear burrata didn't exist five years ago
mt: 我发誓五年前没有布拉塔
ref: 我敢肯定五年前布拉塔芝士不存在
dipper_l80_o40: I swear to you, burrata cheese didn’t exist five years ago.’

src: This is my personal Mandela effect thing.
mt: 这就是我个人的曼德拉效应.
ref: 这东西是我自身的曼德拉效应造成的。
dipper_l80_o40: I have my own Mandela effect.

src: I'd never seen it in a cookbook.
mt: 我从来没有在书中看到过.
ref: 我在食谱上从来没见过。
dipper_l80_o40: I had never seen it in a cookery book.

src: I'd never seen it at the fancy grocer or any of the Italian delis.
mt: 我从来没有在高档杂货店或任何意大利美食店看到过.
ref: 我在高档杂货店或任何意大利熟食店从未见过它。
dipper_l80_o40: I had never seen it in the Italian delicatessen or in the grocer’s shop.

src: I'd never seen anyone's mom make it or had it shoved at me at a party or seen it appear in conjunction with anyone's saucemaking escapades or baking days
mt: 我从来没有见过任何一个做过,或者在聚会上有人把它推给我,
ref: 我从未见过别的妈妈做这道菜，或在聚会上推荐给我，也没有看到它与任何人的酱料恶搞或烘焙日餐品一起出现过
dipper_l80_o40: I had never seen it made by anyone’s mother, nor had I ever been offered it at a party, nor had I ever seen it appear in connection with any sauce-making or baking.

src: It just appeared one day and suddenly it was available everywhere.
mt: 它们只是在某一天出现,
ref: 有一天它出现了，突然它变得随处可见。
dipper_l80_o40: One day it was there, and the next it was everywhere.

src: I've entered the burrata dimension.
mt: 我已经进入了布拉塔维度.
ref: 我已进入布拉塔空间。
dipper_l80_o40: I have entered the dimension of burrata.

src: drake's aging iPad is giving out, so she's in the market for a new tablet.
mt: 德雷克的老旧iPad已经用不了, 所以她在市场上寻找新平板电脑.
ref: 德雷克的老款 iPad 快用坏了，所以她想买一台新的平板电脑。
dipper_l80_o40: The old i-pad of the drake is giving up the ghost, and she is looking for a new one.

src: Having been radicalized here, we're reluctant to buy a new FAANG machine*.
mt: 我们不愿意买新的"FAANG机器".
ref: 在这里被刺激后，我们不想购买新的 FAANG 机器了*。
dipper_l80_o40: After being radicalized here, we are reluctant to buy a new faang.

src: Does anyone have a Linux tablet they love?
mt: 有没有人喜欢的Linux平板电脑?
ref: 谁有自己钟爱的 Linux 平板吗？
dipper_l80_o40: Is there anyone who is happy with a Linux tablet?

src: This would be mainly for web browsing, occasional email, and some games.
mt: 它们主要用于浏览网页,偶尔发送电子邮件,
ref: 它将主要用于浏览网页、偶尔收发电子邮件或者玩游戏。
dipper_l80_o40: I would use it mainly for browsing the web, for a little e-mail, and for games.

src: In 1998-06 Gamefan, in relation to the long development of the first Unreal game, Jason Schrieber commented,
mt: 在1998年至2006年,与第一个虚幻游戏的漫长开发相关的游戏迷,杰森·施里伯评论说,
ref: 在 1998-06 Gamefan，关于首款虚幻游戏的漫长发展，Jason Schrieber 评论道，
dipper_l80_o40: In the June 1998 issue of Gamefan, Jason Schreiber commented on the long development time of the first Unreal game:

src: "A good game is only late until it ships.
mt: "一个好的游戏只有在运输时才会迟到.
ref: “一款好游戏只有在上市后才会被发掘。
dipper_l80_o40: ‘A good game is never late, until it’s shipped.’

src: A bad game is bad forever."
mt: 一场糟糕的比赛永远是糟糕的.
ref: 垃圾游戏永远体验极差。"
dipper_l80_o40: ‘A bad game is a bad game.’

src: So was it Epic that originated this?
mt: 所以是史诗创建了这个?
ref: 那么，是 Epic 开发的这款游戏吗？
dipper_l80_o40: Was it Epicurus who first uttered these words?

src: We can keep going.
mt: 我们可以继续前进.
ref: 我们可以继续看一下。
dipper_l80_o40: We can go on.

src: An earlier issue of GamePro 1997-11 has a quote with far more ambiguity,
mt: 之前的GamePro1997-11号有更为模两可的引用,
ref: GamePro 1997-11 的早期版本有一个更加模糊的引用，
dipper_l80_o40: The quotation from the previous issue of GamePro (issue 97-11) is even more ambiguous:

src: "Or, as an industry catch phrase goes: A late game is only late until it ships.
mt: 游戏的发行时间也很长,
ref: “或者，正如一句行业流行语所说：一款迟到的游戏只有在它发售时才算迟到。
dipper_l80_o40: “Or, as the industry puts it, a late game is only late until it ships.”

src: A bad game is bad for the rest of your life."
mt: 一场糟糕的比赛, 终身都会影响你.
ref: 一款垃圾游戏对你的余生都是残害。”
dipper_l80_o40: ‘A bad game is a bad game for the rest of your life.’

src: Is it so ephemeral then?
mt: 这么短暂吗?
ref: 它真的稍纵即逝？
dipper_l80_o40: ‘Is it so ephemeral?’

src: Merely a "catchphrase" with no clear originator?
mt: 只是一个"流行语", 没有明确的发起人?
ref: 仅仅是一句没有明确出处的“口头禅”？
dipper_l80_o40: A 'catch-phrase' of unknown origin?

src: Smoky, my 10 month old male Domestic Blue kitten, playing with a red rubber Apple Pencil comfort device bought from Amazon he absconded months ago.
mt: 我10个月大的雄性猫猫, 玩着从亚马逊购买的红果笔,
ref: Smoky，我的 10 个月大的雄性家养蓝色小猫，正在玩一个红色胶制苹果笔，它是几个月前从 Amazon 上买的便利设备，后来不见了。
dipper_l80_o40: Smoke, my ten-month-old male blue cat, was playing with a red rubber iPencil, a toy he had stolen from me months ago.

src: He carries it in his mouth proudly all over the house, and I just have to laugh inwardly.
mt: 他把它带在嘴里骄傲的房子, 我只是必须笑在内心.
ref: 他骄傲地叼着它满屋跑，我只能暗自发笑。
dipper_l80_o40: He carries it around the house with him in his mouth, and I can only laugh inwardly.

src: Every time I see him do it.
mt: 每次我看到他这样做.
ref: 每次我看到他都在玩它。
dipper_l80_o40: I see it every time.

src: Have now done a full round trip on the new ICNG train.
mt: 现在已经在新ICNG列车上完成了全面的往返.
ref: 我现在已经在新 ICNG 列车上完成了一次完整的往返旅行。
dipper_l80_o40: I have now made a round trip on the new ICNG.

src: I really like it.
mt: 我真的很喜欢它.
ref: 我很喜欢这个列车。
dipper_l80_o40: I like it very much.

src: Esp the carriages with the bigger windows.
mt: 尤其是那些窗户更大的车.
ref: 尤其是车厢窗户很大。
dipper_l80_o40: The carriages with the larger windows are especially favored.

src: There's areas that could use some polish.
mt: 有一些地方需要磨光.
ref: 有些地方有待提高。
dipper_l80_o40: There are some parts that need to be polished.

src: Namely the lack of enough bins, and the lack of signs to explain the significance of the lighting colours.
mt: 尤其是缺乏足够的垃圾, 缺乏解释灯光颜色意义的标志.
ref: 比如，垃圾箱不足，并且缺少指示灯光颜色所代表的意义的标志。
dipper_l80_o40: The lack of sufficient waste-paper baskets and the lack of signs explaining the significance of the different colours of the lights.

src: Fix those minor issues, and then can we have more of these please?
mt: 解决这些小问题,然后我们可以有更多的这些请?
ref: 解决这些小问题，然后我们还会有更多这样的小问题吗？
dipper_l80_o40: “It’s a good thing you’re here, but you’d better fix those little things first, and then we can have more of these, please.”

src: I won't be sad to see the end of the ICM or DDZ stock.
mt: 我不会因为ICM或DDZ股票的消失而感到悲伤.
ref: 看到 ICM 或 DDZ 股票的终结，我并不会感到难过。
dipper_l80_o40: I shall not be sorry to see the end of the I.C.M. and the DDZ.

src: One per customer rules remain as we try to ensure everyone who queues up can get their hands on a board.
mt: 为了确保每位排队的人都能得到一个板.
ref: 人手一个的规则仍然存在，因为我们试图确保每个排队的人都可以得到一个板。
dipper_l80_o40: The one-per-customer rule is still in effect, so that everyone who comes to the store can get a board.

src: You can buy ONE of the boards listed above, not one of each.
mt: 您可以购买上述板中的一块,而不是每一个.
ref: 你可以买上面列出的一种板，而不是每种各买一个。
dipper_l80_o40: You can buy only one of the boards listed above, not one of each.

src: There are no buying restrictions on Picos or other merchandise.
mt: 对于皮科或其他商品, 没有购买限制.
ref: Picos 或其他商品没有购买限制。
dipper_l80_o40: There are no restrictions on the purchase of picos or any other goods.

src: Yesterday I had the best time with my friend and former rabbi colleague.
mt: 现在我知道我在哪里.
ref: 昨天我和我的朋友也是之前的拉比同事玩得很开心。
dipper_l80_o40: I had a wonderful time yesterday with my friend and former colleague, the rabbi.

src: We visited for a couple hours on my porch.
mt: 我们在门廊上拜访了几个小时.
ref: 在我的走廊，我们一同度过了几个小时。
dipper_l80_o40: We sat on my verandah for a couple of hours.

src: Such friendships transcend differences.
mt: 这种友超越了我们的差异.
ref: 我们的友谊跨越了差异。
dipper_l80_o40: Friendships of this kind are above all differences.

src: We all have stories to tell.
mt: 我们都有故事要讲.
ref: 我们都有相告彼此的故事。
dipper_l80_o40: We all have our stories.

src: The Lord bless you and keep you!
mt: 愿上帝保佑你,保护你!
ref: 上帝保佑你，祝福你！
dipper_l80_o40: God bless you and keep you!

src: And the marsh is greening up.
mt: 沼泽也开始变绿.
ref: 并且沼泽地正在变成绿色。
dipper_l80_o40: The marsh is greening.

src: I quite like akkoma the software and the domain name I got for my instance.
mt: 我很喜欢软件和域名.
ref: 我很喜欢 akkoma 软件还有我为我的实例申请的域名。
dipper_l80_o40: I like the Akkoma system and the domain name I got for my instance.

src: But I feel somehow I started this instance on the wrong foot, so to speak.
mt: 但我觉得我开始这个案例的错误,可以这么说.
ref: 但我觉得不知何故，我一开始就走错了路，可以这么说。
dipper_l80_o40: I feel that I have begun this case in the wrong way.

src: And I never got comfy there.
mt: 我从来没有感到舒服.
ref: 我在那里一直觉得不舒服。
dipper_l80_o40: I never felt at home there.

src: Will still linger a bit longer on here and think about whether I should migrate at all.
mt: 现在我还是想想, 我是否应该迁移.
ref: 我仍然会在这里多逗留一会儿，考虑我是否应该迁移。
dipper_l80_o40: I shall stay here a little longer, and think whether I shall go or not.

src: #FalconGameBooks
mt: 现在我们可以看到
ref: #FalconGameBooks
dipper_l80_o40: The Falcon Game Books

src: The eight-eyed Repnids seem to be watching as you settle the flyer down on the red soil, but they make no move towards you, in fact they are motionless as you climb out of the flyer and walk slowly towards them.
mt: 八眼的爬行动物似乎在看着你把飞行器放在红色的土壤上, 但他们没有向你移动, 事实上,当你爬出飞行器,慢慢走向他们时, 他们是不动的.
ref: 当你把飞行器停在红土上时，八眼 Repnid 似乎在看着你，但它们不会向你移动，事实上，当你爬出飞行器，慢慢走向它们时，它们是一动不动的。
dipper_l80_o40: The eight-eyed reptiles seem to be watching you as you set down the flier on the red earth, but they do not move. They do not even stir as you get out of the flier and walk slowly towards them.

src: The ground beneath your feet begins to tremble and then shake, as if in an earthquake and you lose your footing, though the Repnids seem unaffected.
mt: 像地震一样, 你失去立足,
ref: 尽管 Repnid 看似没有受到影响，你脚下的地面开始震颤，然后摇晃，像是地震，你站不稳。
dipper_l80_o40: The earth trembles and sways as in an earthquake, and you lose your footing. The Repnids, however, are not disturbed.

src: The rock beneath you gives way suddenly.
mt: 下面的岩石突然崩塌了.
ref: 你脚下的岩石突然坍塌了。
dipper_l80_o40: The rock beneath you suddenly crumbles.

src: Repnids have tunnelled below the surface and you fall into a boiling mass of hundreds of Repnid bodies in a cavern below.
mt: 爬虫类在地表下挖掘了道, 你就会入一座洞穴里,
ref: Repnid 在地表下挖了一条隧道，你掉进了下面的一个洞穴里，里面有一堆挤满整个洞穴的 Repnid 尸体。
dipper_l80_o40: The reptiles had dug a tunnel under the surface of the ground, and you fell into a cavern where a hundred of them were writhing in a seething mass.

src: The end is swift, as several pairs of fangs inject their deadly venom and the air of Dyskra contaminates your lungs.
mt: 几对牙注入了致命的毒液,
ref: 很快就到结局了，几对尖牙喷射出致命的毒液，Dyskra 的空气污染了你的肺部。
dipper_l80_o40: The end is swift, for the venom of the many fangs is injected into the lungs, and the air of Dyskra is sucked into the lungs.

src: Nobody will ever know that you were the first human future traveller.
mt: 没有人会知道你是第一个未来人类旅行者.
ref: 没人会知道你是第一位人类未来旅行者。
dipper_l80_o40: You will never be known as the first human traveller to the future.

src: You land the flyer nose upward on the side of the slag heap and climb out.
mt: 飞行员的鼻子向上降落在废渣堆的一侧,然后爬出来.
ref: 你将飞行器机头朝上降落在矿渣堆的一侧，然后爬出来。
dipper_l80_o40: You land the plane nose-first on the side of the slag-heap and climb out.

src: The eight-eyed Repnids seem to be watching, but they make no move towards you, in fact they are motionless as you walk slowly towards them.
mt: 八眼的爬行动物似乎在看着你, 但他们没有向你移动,
ref: 八眼 Repnid 似乎在看着你，但它们不会向你移动，事实上，当你慢慢走向它们时，它们是静止的。
dipper_l80_o40: The eight-eyed reptiles seem to be watching you, but they do not move towards you. They stand motionless as you approach them.

src: You halt while still on the mound of crumbled rock and soil and speak to them, saying, 'I come in peace, as a friend.'
mt: 你站在碎石和土堆上,对他们说:'我来是为了和平,作为朋友.
ref: 当你仍然站在碎石和泥土的土堆上时，你停下来对他们说，我是为和平而来的，是你们的朋友。
dipper_l80_o40: You stop on the sand-covered mound and say to them, “I come in peace, as a friend.”

src: It appears that they cannot hear you, let alone understand, as your Universal Translator picks up no answer.
mt: 似乎他们听不到, 更不用说理解, 因为你的通用翻译器没有接收到任何答案.
ref: 他们似乎听不到你的话，更不用说理解了，因为你的通用翻译器没有得到任何回答。
dipper_l80_o40: They can’t hear you, let alone understand you, because your Universal Translator hasn’t picked up any response.

src: You decide to use your Psychic Awareness to contact them mentally.
mt: 你决定使用你的心灵意识与他们精神联系.
ref: 你决定用你的通灵意识通过意识与他们沟通。
dipper_l80_o40: You decide to use your psychic powers to contact them.

src: It is difficult to make sense of their thoughts; they are terrifyingly alien and your mind recoils from the contact.
mt: 很难理解他们的想法; 他们是可怕的异国, 你的思想从接触中退缩.
ref: 很难理解他们的想法；他们是可怕的异类，你的思维在沟通中适得其反。
dipper_l80_o40: Their thoughts are so strange that they are hard to understand. They are so alien that one’s mind recoils from contact with them.

src: You decide that establishing contact again would be dangerous and return to your flyer, but the experience has cleared your mind which had been befuddled ever since you jumped into the future.
mt: 你决定重新建立联系是危险的,回到你的飞行器, 但经验已经清除了你的头脑,
ref: 你想到，再次建立沟通会很危险，然后你回到你的飞行器上，但是这一经历已经清除了你的头脑，自从你跳入未来以来，你的头脑一直是混乱的。
dipper_l80_o40: You decide that it would be dangerous to establish contact again, and you return to your ship. But the experience has cleared your mind, which had been clouded since you jumped into the future.

src: Once back in Falcon's Wing you find it quite easy to plot a course for Earth in 3034 AD.
mt: 现在,我们可以很容易地为地球定位在公元3034年.
ref: 一旦回到猎鹰之翼，你会发现很容易绘制出公元 3034 年地球的路线。
dipper_l80_o40: You are now in the Falcon’s Wing, and it is easy to calculate the course to be taken to reach the earth in the year 3034.

src: Note that you have used up another polybdenum rod as you jump.
mt: 需要注意的是,
ref: 注意，当你跳跃的时候，你已经用完了另一根聚钼棒。
dipper_l80_o40: You have used up another phosphorus rod in your leap.

src: [cont'd]
mt: [继续]
dipper_l80_o40: CONTINUED

src: #today I have coffee, sunshine and quiet time!
mt: 今天我喝咖啡,阳光和安静的时间!
ref: #今天我享受着咖啡、阳光和安静的时光带来的体验！
dipper_l80_o40: I have coffee, sunshine, and peace of mind.

src: I started a new shawl.
mt: 我开始了新的披肩.
ref: 我开始做新披肩。
dipper_l80_o40: I began a new shawl.

src: I am unsure of it at this time.
mt: 我现在不确定.
ref: 我现在还不确定。
dipper_l80_o40: I am not sure of that at the moment.

src: I found a unevenly spun silver gray yarn that is mostly finely spun with lumps.
mt: 我发现一根不均的银灰色线,
ref: 我发现了一种纺得不均匀的银灰色纱线，这种纱线大多纺得很细，带有结块。
dipper_l80_o40: I found a silver-gray yarn, mostly finely spun, but with a few thicker strands.

src: I plan on mixing it with a fine purple/lilac variegated cotton.
mt: 我打算将其与紫色/紫色的棉花混合.
ref: 我打算把它和一种上好的紫色/淡紫色杂色棉混合在一起。
dipper_l80_o40: I am going to mix it with a fine purple and lilac cotton.

src: But am not sure I have enough of the purple.
mt: 但我不确定我有足够的紫色.
ref: 但我不确定我有足够的紫色。
dipper_l80_o40: I haven’t enough purple, though.

src: I am using a H hook with a similar double crochet pattern as I have done before.
mt: 我使用的是一个H,
ref: 我用了一个 H 型钩，和我以前用过的类似的双钩针图案。
dipper_l80_o40: I am using the H-hook and the same double-crochet stitch as before.

src: I made the first join last night so we shall see.
mt: 我昨晚做了第一笔,我们将会看到.
ref: 我昨晚第一个加入，所以我们拭目以待。
dipper_l80_o40: I made the first stitch last night, so we shall see.

src: Wishing everyone a happy Thursday!
mt: 祝大家一个愉快的星期四!
ref: 祝大家周四快乐！
dipper_l80_o40: Happy Thursday to you all!

src: However, I hate classes on fine arts and literature, and my school history bears it out.
mt: 我不喜欢艺术和文学课,
ref: 但是，我不喜欢美术和文学课，我的求学历程可以证明这一点。
dipper_l80_o40: I hated the classes in art and literature, and my school record bears me out.

src: I have literally tried and dropped EVERY SINGLE ONE.
mt: 我已经试过,
ref: 我真的试过了，每一科都丢了。
dipper_l80_o40: I have tried and failed with every one of them.

src: And up until like two years ago, I had no idea until I checked my transcripts.
mt: 直到两年前, 我才知道, 直到我查看了我的成绩单.
ref: 直到两年前，看了我的成绩单，我才知道。
dipper_l80_o40: I didn’t know until two years ago, when I checked my records.

mt: 虽然没有治愈肌缩性侧面硬化症 (ALS), 但知道她不是唯一努力开发治疗方法并为患者提供更好的选择的人,

src: The bear had hunkered down in a culvert alongside the road near Wannaska, Minnesota, according to a Facebook post from the department.
mt: 据该部门在Facebook上发布的消息,
ref: 根据该部门在 Facebook 上发布的帖子，这只熊曾被困在明尼苏达州 Wannaska 附近路边的一个涵洞里。
dipper_l80_o40: The bear was squatting in a culvert near the road in the vicinity of Wannaska, according to a post on the department's Facebook page.

src: But when the snow began to melt, the culvert started to flood, trapping the bear in deep snow and ice, according to the department.
mt: 据该部门称, 雪开始融化,
ref: 据该部门称，当雪开始融化时，涵洞开始泛滥，将熊困在深深的冰雪中。
dipper_l80_o40: The bear was rescued by the police, who said that the bear had been caught in the culvert by the thaw, and had been buried in the snow and ice.

src: Staff from the department quickly responded to the scene and helped remove the bear.
mt: 部门的工作人员迅速应对现场并帮助移除熊.
ref: 该部门的工作人员迅速赶到现场，帮助移走了这只熊。
dipper_l80_o40: The policemen hurriedly came to the scene and helped to remove the bear.

src: The department's bear biologist, Andrew Tri, "examined the bear and pronounced him healthy but groggy - obviously, because he'd been woken up from his winter sleep," according to the Facebook post.
mt: 根据Facebook帖子, 该部门的熊生物学家安德鲁·特里 (Andrew Tri) "检查了这只熊, 宣布它健康但昏迷 - - 显然是因为它从冬季睡眠中醒来了".
ref: 根据 Facebook 帖子，该部门的熊生物学家 Andrew Tri“检查了这只熊并表示，它很健康，但有点虚弱——显然，由于它刚从冬眠中醒来”。
dipper_l80_o40: The bear was examined by the department's bear expert, Andrej Tri, who found him to be in good health, but he was a little dazed, probably because he had been awakened from his winter sleep, according to the post on the department's Facebook page.

src: The department then relocated the bear to a state sanctuary to resume his hibernation.
mt: 部门随后将熊转移到国家保护区,
ref: 该部门随后将这只熊转移到一个州立保护区，让它继续冬眠。
dipper_l80_o40: The bear was then transferred to a state-run reserve, where it was to resume its hibernation.

src: The sleepy carnivore was estimated to be 6 years old and between 375 and 400 pounds.
mt: 据估计,这只嗜睡的食肉动物年龄为6岁, 重量在375到400磅之间.
ref: 这只昏昏欲睡的食肉动物估计有 6 岁龄，体重在 375 到 400 磅之间。
dipper_l80_o40: The slumbering beast was estimated to be six years old, and weighed between 375 and 400 pounds.

src: The department reminded residents that moving bears is a job best left to the professionals.
mt: 部门提醒居民搬迁熊是最好留给专业人士的工作.
ref: 该部门提醒居民，转移熊的位置最好留给专业人士完成。
dipper_l80_o40: The department reminded the inhabitants that the transport of bears is a job for the experts.

src: If you're worried about a bear in your neighborhood, you should contact local authorities - not try to move or feed the sleeping giant.
mt: 如果您担心附近有熊, 您应该联系当地当局,
ref: 如果你担心你的邻居家有熊，你应该联系当地政府——而不是试图转移或喂养此类冬眠中的巨型动物。
dipper_l80_o40: If you are afraid of a bear in your neighborhood, you should contact the local authorities, not try to move or feed the sleeping giant.

src: In this case, bystanders first tried to dig out the bear by themselves and offered him food, including Pop-Tarts, lettuce and Fancy Feast cat food.
mt: 首先是亲自挖出熊, 提供食物,
ref: 在这种情况下，旁观者首先试图自己挖出这只熊，并给他提供食物，包括馅饼、生菜和精美的猫食。
dipper_l80_o40: The bear was rescued by the police, who had first tried to dig him out themselves, and had offered him food, including Pop Tarts, lettuce, and cat food.

src: But, luckily for the well-intentioned diggers, "because bears don't have the desire to eat in the winter, the bear didn't bite."
mt: 由于熊在冬天不想吃, 熊没有咬人.
ref: 但是，对于好心的挖掘者来说，幸运的是，“因为熊在冬天没有进食的欲望，所以熊没有咬人。”
dipper_l80_o40: But luckily for the good-hearted men, the bear had no appetite in winter, and did not bite.

src: Minnesota is home to between 12,000 and 15,000 black bears, found mainly in the northern third of the state, according to the Department of Natural Resources.
mt: 根据自然资源部的数据, 密尼苏达州有12000到15000只黑熊,
ref: 根据自然资源部的数据，明尼苏达州有 12000 至 15000 只黑熊，主要分布在该州北部三分之一的地区。
dipper_l80_o40: The black bear is the most dangerous of all the wild animals in the United States.

src: The predators hibernate for as long as six or seven months in the winter, during which time they do not eat and live off of their stored body fat.
mt: 它们在冬季的冬眠时间长达6到7个月,
ref: 此类熊在冬天冬眠长达六到七个月，在此期间，它们不进食，靠储存在体内的脂肪为生。
dipper_l80_o40: In winter, the wolves hibernate for six or seven months, and they do not eat, but live on the fat they have stored up.

src: Photos: Following restorations, Egypt inaugurates the Djehuty and Hery tombs
mt: 照片:埃及恢复后, 开启了德赫赫蒂和赫里墓
ref: 照片：修复之后，埃及举行了 Djehuty 和 Hery 陵墓落成典礼
dipper_l80_o40: After restoration, Egypt reopens the tombs of Djehuty and Hery.

src: The tombs of Djehuty and Hery have been inaugurated on Thursday following the completion of restoration work.
mt: 德赫赫蒂和赫里的墓地在修复工作完成后已于周四开放.
ref: 修复工作完成后， Djehuty 和 Hery 的陵墓于周四举行了落成典礼。
dipper_l80_o40: The tombs of Djehuty and Hery were opened on Thursday, after the completion of the restoration work.

src: The inauguration was conducted by the Secretary General of the Supreme Council of Antiquities in Egypt Mostafa Waziri, Ambassador of Span to Egypt Alvaro Iranzo, and the President of the Spanish National Research Council (CSIC), Eloísa del Pino.
mt: 开幕式由埃及古物最高委员会秘书长Mostafa Waziri,西班牙驻埃及大使Alvaro Iranzo和西班牙国家研究委员会 (CSIC) 主席Eloísa del Pino主持.
ref: 落成典礼由埃及最高文物委员会秘书长 Mostafa Waziri、西班牙驻埃及大使 Alvaro Iranzo 和西班牙国家研究委员会（CSIC）主席 Eloísa del Pino 主持。
dipper_l80_o40: The inauguration was performed by the Secretary of the Supreme Council of Antiquities of Egypt, Mostafa Waziri, the Spanish Ambassador to Egypt, Alvaro Iranzo, and the President of the Spanish National Research Council, Elosa del Pino.

src: Waziri explained that the two tombs were discovered through the joint Egyptian-Spanish archaeological mission from the Supreme Council of Antiquities and CSIC, working since 2002.
mt: 瓦齐里解释说,这两个坟墓是埃及和西班牙古迹委员会和CSIC联合考古团发现的,
ref: Waziri 解释说，这两座坟墓是由埃及和 CSIC 最高文物委员会的埃及-西班牙联合考古团发现的，他们从 2002 年开始工作。
dipper_l80_o40: The two tombs were discovered by the Spanish-Egyptian expedition of the Supreme Council of Antiquities and the Spanish Council for Scientific Research, which had been working in the country since the year 2002.

src: He said that the mission carried out excavation and restoration work and published research related to the tombs, which are located in the Dra Abu al-Naga area on the west bank of Luxor.
mt: 他表示,该团队进行了挖掘和修复工作,并发表了与墓穴相关的研究,
ref: 他表示，考古团进行了挖掘和修复工作，并公布了与坟墓有关的研究，这些坟墓位于卢克索西岸的 Dra Abu al-Naga 地区。
dipper_l80_o40: The tombs are situated in the Draa-Abu-Naga district on the west bank of the Nile.

src: They succeeded in uncovering many tombs, coffins, mummies and a funerary garden.
mt: 他们成功地发现了许多坟墓,棺材,木乃伊和一个墓园.
ref: 他们成功发现了许多坟墓、棺材、木乃伊和一个墓地。
dipper_l80_o40: They succeeded in unearthing many tombs, coffins, mummies, and a funerary garden.

src: Important tombs from an important era
mt: 重要时代的重要墓碑
ref: 一个重要时代的重要坟墓
dipper_l80_o40: Important tombs from an important era

src: Wazir explained that these two tombs belong to prominent people, who lived during the beginning of the 18th dynasty of the New Kingdom - one of the most important eras of ancient Egypt.
mt: 瓦齐尔解释说,这两座坟墓属于著名人物,
ref: Wazir 解释说，这两座坟墓墓主人都是著名人物，他们生活在新王国第 18 王朝（古埃及最重要的时代之一）的开端。
dipper_l80_o40: The two tombs were those of two important persons who lived at the beginning of the eighteenth dynasty of the new kingdom, one of the most important periods of the ancient history of Egypt.

src: He said that the layout of the tombs are T-shaped, a style commonly used in tombs from the 18th dynasty.
mt: 墓地的布局是T形,
ref: 他表示，这些坟墓的布局是 T 形的，这是 18 世纪坟墓中常用的一种风格。
dipper_l80_o40: The tombs were arranged in a T-shape, a common design of the 18th dynasty.

src: These consistent of an entrance, a column hall leading to a burial shaft, and walls featuring distinct inscriptions.
mt: 这些都与入口,通往墓穴的柱子大厅,以及墙壁上有不同的铭文一致.
ref: 这些墓葬包括一个入口、一个圆柱大厅通向一个埋葬竖井，墙壁上有明显的铭文。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he drew the charioteer’s attention to the inscriptions on the walls of the tomb.

src: Waziri added that Djehuty was supervisor of the state treasury and overviewed works of craftsmen and artists during the reign of Queen Hatshepsut.
mt: 瓦齐里补充说,Djehuty是国家财政监督,并在哈特谢普苏特女王统治期间监督工匠和艺术家的作品.
ref: Waziri 补充说，Djehuty 在哈特谢普苏特女王统治期间是国库的主管，负责审查工匠和艺术家的作品。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he added that Djehuty had been the controller of the treasury and the overseer of the works of the craftsmen and artists during the reign of Hatshepsut.

src: Djehuty was also responsible for recording Hatshepsut's journey to Puntland, and providing electrum (a mixture of gold and silver) for covering the top of the obelisks that she placed in the Karnak temples.
mt: 德赫赫蒂还负责记录哈特谢普苏特前往普恩特兰的旅程,并提供电 (金银混合物) 用于覆盖她在卡纳克寺放置的石碑的顶部.
ref: Djehuty 还负责记录哈特谢普苏特到邦特兰的旅程，并为她放置在卡纳克神庙神庙的方尖碑顶部提供银金矿（金银混合物）。
dipper_l80_o40: Djehuty also accompanied her on her expedition to Punt, and he also provided the electrum for the tops of the obelisks which she erected in the temples of Karnak.

src: In addition, he was in charge of the process of moving the obelisks.
mt: 他还负责移动石碑的过程.
ref: 此外，他还负责移动方尖碑的过程。
dipper_l80_o40: He was also in charge of the obelisks.

src: The room that precedes the Djehuty's burial chamber features inscriptions engraved with 43 chapters of the Book of the Dead, the first time that the chapters of the book were written on the walls of tombs before being written on linen and papyrus.
mt: 在德赫赫蒂的墓室前面的房间里,有43章的"死人书"刻着的铭文,这是该书的章节在在麻布和纸上写之前,首次被写在坟墓的墙壁上.
ref: Djehuty 墓室前面的房间刻有《死亡之书》的 43 个章节，这是该书的章节第一次写在坟墓的墙上，然后写在亚麻布和纸草上。
dipper_l80_o40: The antechamber of the tomb of Djehuty, which precedes the chamber of the dead, is inscribed with the forty-three chapters of the Book of the Dead. This was the first time that the chapters of the Book of the Dead were inscribed on the walls of a tomb, before they were inscribed on linen and papyrus.

src: Hery, held the position of superintendent of the royal stores of the sacred royal wife and mother, Ahhotep.
mt: 赫里,担任了皇室储备的监督官的职位,
ref: Hery 担任神圣的皇家妻子和母亲 Ahhotep 的皇家商店的主管。
dipper_l80_o40: The king’s wife, Ahhotep, had appointed him to be the keeper of the royal treasury.

src: Jared O'Mara should never have been a Labour candidate, says Rachel Reeves
mt: 拉切尔·里夫斯说,贾雷德·奥马拉从来不应该成为工党候选人
ref: Rachel Reeves 表示，Jared O'Mara 本来就不应该成为工党候选人
dipper_l80_o40: Jared O’Mara should never have been a Labour candidate, says Rachel Reeves.

src: The disgraced former MP Jared O'Mara "should never have been selected as a Labour candidate" and deserves his four-year jail sentence, the shadow chancellor has said.
mt: 的前议员贾雷德·奥马拉"永远不应该被选为工党候选人",
ref: 影子内阁财政大臣说，名誉扫地的前议员 Jared O'Mara“本不应该被选为工党候选人”，他应该被判四年监禁。
dipper_l80_o40: Jared O'Mara, the disgraced former MP, should never have been chosen as a Labour candidate and deserves his four-year prison sentence, the shadow Chancellor has said.

src: Rachel Reeves was talking to the Guardian in the Bolton North East constituency on Friday, hours after key figures in the local party quit in protest at how Labour's national executive committee (NEC) was controlling the parliamentary selection process for the next general election.
mt: 雷切尔·里夫斯在周五在博尔顿东北选区与"卫报"进行了采访,
ref: Rachel Reeves 周五在博尔顿东北选区接受《卫报》采访，几个小时前，当地政党的关键人物辞职，以抗议工党全国执行委员会（NEC）如何控制下届大选的议会选举过程。
dipper_l80_o40: The Guardian was in Bolton North East on Friday, the day after a number of local party activists had resigned in protest at the way the NEC was handling the selection of the party’s candidate for the next general election.

src: The entire selection committee in Bolton North East resigned after they were not allowed to choose the shortlist, an increasingly common practice in Keir Starmer's Labour party, saying: "Yet again, it appears that the Labour party is seeking to promote the views and attitudes of a clique in London, rather than local members in the north."
mt: 波尔顿东北地区的整个选拔委员会在不被允许选择入选者后辞职, 这在凯尔·斯塔默的工党中是一个越来越常见的做法, 他说:"似乎工党再次寻求促进伦敦小伙的观点和态度, 而不是北方的当地成员.
ref: 博尔顿东北部的整个遴选委员会在不允许他们选择候选名单后辞职，这在凯尔·斯塔默的工党中越来越常见，他们说：“然而，工党似乎又一次试图宣扬伦敦某个小集团的观点和态度，而不是北方当地议员的观点和态度。”
dipper_l80_o40: The Bolton North East selection committee resigned in protest at the fact that they had not been allowed to choose the short-list of candidates, a procedure which has become more common under Keir Starmer. They said: ‘Once again it seems that the Labour Party is promoting the views and attitudes of a clique in London rather than those of its members in the north.’

src: They added: "This goes against the attitude necessary to win back the red wall, which is so desperately needed to deliver a Labour government."
mt: 他们补充说:"这与夺回红墙所需的态度相反, 这对于工党政府来说是如此迫切的.
ref: 他们补充道：“这与赢回红墙所需的态度背道而驰，而红墙是组建工党政府所迫切需要的。”
dipper_l80_o40: “This is not the attitude to adopt in order to win back the red wall, which is so necessary for the election of a Labour government.”

src: Reeves said: "I don't know what the circumstances are of what has happened in Bolton, but I do know that those being selected are strong candidates, often with very strong roots in their communities."
mt: 里夫斯说:"我不知道博尔顿发生的情况是什么,
ref: Reeves 表示：“我不知道博尔顿的情况如何，但我知道那些被选中的人都是强有力的候选人，他们通常在自己的社区有着非常牢固的根基。”
dipper_l80_o40: ‘I don’t know what happened in Bolton, but I do know that the people who are chosen are strong candidates, often with deep roots in their communities.’

src: There has been particular unhappiness that Leigh Drennan, the chair of Labour North West and aide to the Jeremy Corbyn-supporting Warrington North MP Charlotte Nichols, was not longlisted to try to win the seat back from the Conservatives, despite garnering nominations from four big trade unions.
mt: 特别令人不满的是, 劳工党西北区主席, 支持杰里米·科尔宾的沃林顿北区议员夏洛特·尼科尔斯的助手莱德·德伦南没有被列入试图从保守党夺回席位的候选人名单,
ref: 尤其令人懊恼的是，尽管西北工党主席兼支持 Jeremy Corbyn 的沃灵顿北议员 Charlotte Nichols 的助手 Leigh Drennan 获得了四大工会的提名，但没有尽力从保守党手中夺回席位。
dipper_l80_o40: The omission of Leigh Drennan, the secretary of the Labour Party in the North-West, and a close associate of the ardent Corbynite, Charlotte Nicholls, who represents Warrington North, has been a source of particular annoyance. He had received nominations from four of the largest trade unions.

src: Reeves said she had nothing to do with candidate selection, but added: "I do know that it's really important that we have rigorous processes for who can be longlisted and who can be shortlisted."
mt: 里夫斯说她与候选人选择无关, 但补充说:"我确实知道我们对于谁可以被列入长名单,谁可以被列入短名单, 有严格的流程是非常重要的.
ref: Reeves 表示她与候选人的选择无关，但补充道：“我明确知悉，我们有严格的流程来决定谁能入围，谁能被列入候选名单，这真的很重要。”
dipper_l80_o40: Reeves said she had nothing to do with the selection of the candidates, but added: “I do know that we have to have a very strict procedure for deciding who can be nominated and who can be nominated.”

src: O'Mara was imprisoned for four years this week after a jury found he had submitted fake expense claims totalling £52,000 in an attempt to fund his cocaine and alcohol abuse.
mt: 陪审团发现他提交了虚假的费用索赔,
ref: 本周，O'Mara 在陪审团发现他提交了总计 5.2 万英镑的虚假费用报销申请，试图为他的可卡因和酒精滥用提供资金后，被监禁四年。
dipper_l80_o40: The swindler, who had been convicted of submitting false bills for £50,000, was sentenced to four years in prison.

src: Many people have suggested he was not properly vetted by Labour when he was selected to fight Nick Clegg, the former Liberal Democrat deputy prime minister, in Sheffield Hallam in 2017"s snap general election.
mt: 许多人认为他没有得到工党的适当审查, 当他被选为与前自由民主党副总理尼克·克莱格在谢菲尔德·哈勒姆的2017年大选对抗时.
ref: 许多人认为，在 2017 年的谢菲尔德哈拉姆大选中，他被选中与前自由民主党副首相 Nick Clegg 竞争时，没有经过工党的适当审查。
dipper_l80_o40: Then he was a member of the Labour Party, and was a candidate for election in the general election of the year 1832.

src: Asked if the O'Mara debacle was looming large in the minds of Labour's NEC, Reeves said: "I don't want to suggest in any way that anyone not on a shortlist is a cocaine user.
mt: 里夫斯说:"我不想以任何方式暗示没有入围名单的人是可卡因使用者.
ref: 当被问及工党全国选举委员会是否对奥玛拉的惨败忧心忡忡时，Reeves 说：“我不想以任何方式暗示，在候选名单之外的人都使用可卡因。
dipper_l80_o40: “I don’t want to suggest that anyone who isn’t on the shortlist is a cocaine addict.

src: But Jared O'Mara was a terrible case.
mt: 但贾雷德·奥马拉是一个可怕的案例.
ref: 但是 Jared O'Mara 是个可怕的例子。
dipper_l80_o40: But Jared O'Mara was a terrible case.

src: He should never have been selected as a Labour candidate; he should never have been an MP.
mt: 他本不应该成为工党候选人,
ref: 他本不该被选为工党候选人，也不该成为一名议员。
dipper_l80_o40: He should never have been chosen as a Labour candidate. He should never have been an MP.

src: He used public money, it's absolutely right he's received his sentence."
mt: 他使用了公共资金,
ref: 他用的是公款，他被判刑是理所应当的。”
dipper_l80_o40: 'It's quite right, he's been convicted.'

src: The O'Mara circumstances were "pretty exceptional," said Reeves, but she acknowledged: "There are important lessons to be learned for the Labour party and all political parties on the selection of candidates.
mt: 里夫斯说,奥马拉的情况"相当特殊",但她承认:"工党和所有政党在候选人选择方面都需要学习重要经验.
ref: Reeves 表示，O'Mara 的情况“非常特殊”，但她也承认：“对于工党和所有政党来说，在挑选候选人方面都有重要的经验教训要吸取。
dipper_l80_o40: The circumstances surrounding the O’Mara case were “pretty exceptional,” Reeves said, but she acknowledged that “there are important lessons to be learned for the Labour Party and for all political parties about the selection of candidates.”

src: But I would also say, in this parliament we have seen the constant undermining of standards in politics, not least by a succession of prime ministers and fines and parties and standards falling well short of what you could expect."
mt: 我也想说, 在这个议会, 我们看到不断的破坏政治标准,
ref: 但我也要说，在这个议会中，我们看到了政治标准的不断削弱，不仅仅是一连串的总理和罚款，政党和标准远远低于你所能期望的。”
