src: The statement from Prigozhin, a millionaire who has close links to Russian President Vladimir Putin and was dubbed "Putin's chef" for his lucrative Kremlin catering contracts, marked a recognition of the difficulties that the Kremlin has faced in the campaign, which it initially expected to wrap up within weeks when Russian troops invaded Ukraine on Feb. 24.
mt: 普里戈吉恩的声明, 他是与俄罗斯总统普京有密切联系的百万富翁, 由于他钱的克里姆林宫餐饮合同, 被称作"普京的厨师",
ref: Prigozhin 是一名百万富翁，与俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京关系密切，因其利润丰厚的克里姆林宫餐饮合同而被称为“普京的厨师”，他的声明标志着克里姆林宫认识到了竞选中面临的困难。在俄罗斯军队于 2 月 24 日入侵乌克兰时，最初预计竞选将在几周内结束。
dipper_l80_o40: The statement of Prigozhin, a millionaire with close ties to President Vladimir Putin, who is known as “Putin’s Cook,” was a tacit admission of the difficulties that the Kremlin has encountered in the course of the campaign, which it had originally expected to be over in a few weeks after the invasion of Ukraine on February 24.

src: Russia suffered a series of humiliating setbacks in the fall when the Ukrainian military launched successful counteroffensives to reclaim broad swaths of territory in the east and the south.
mt: 俄罗斯在秋季遭受了一系列令人羞耻的挫折,
ref: 到了秋天，乌克兰军方成功发起反攻，收复了东部和南部的大片领土，俄罗斯因此遭受了一系列屈辱性的挫折。
dipper_l80_o40: In the autumn of that year, the Russians suffered a series of humiliating defeats, when the Ukrainians, in the course of a series of counter-offensives, regained a large part of the lost territories in the east and south.

src: The Kremlin has avoided making forecasts on how long the fighting could continue, saying that what it called the "special military operation" will continue until its goals are fulfilled.
mt: 克里姆林宫避免预测战斗可能持续多久, 称"特殊军事行动"将持续到目标实现为止.
ref: 克里姆林宫没有预测战斗的持续时间，称其所谓的“特别军事行动”将持续到目标实现。
dipper_l80_o40: The Kremlin has not yet made any forecasts as to the duration of the fighting, but has stated that the “special operation” will continue until its goals are achieved.

src: The Russian forces have focused on Ukraine's Luhansk and Donetsk provinces that make up the Donbas region where Moscow-backed separatists have been fighting Ukrainian forces since 2014.
mt: 俄罗斯军队专注于乌克兰卢甘斯克和顿涅茨克省,
ref: 俄罗斯军队一直专注于乌克兰的卢甘斯克和顿涅茨克省，这两个省组成了顿巴斯地区，自 2014 年以来，莫斯科支持的独立主义分子一直在该地区与乌克兰军队作战。
dipper_l80_o40: The Russians have been concentrating their efforts on the eastern regions of Ukraine, on the Donbass, where the Russian-backed rebels have been fighting the Ukrainian army since 2014.

src: Prigozhin said that the Wagner Group mercenaries were continuing fierce battles for control of the Ukrainian stronghold of Bakhmut in the Donetsk region.
mt: 普里戈吉恩说, 瓦格纳集团的雇佣兵正在继续为控制乌克兰在顿涅茨克地区的巴赫穆特堡垒而进行激烈的战斗.
ref: Prigozhin 说，瓦格纳集团雇佣军正在继续激烈战斗，以控制顿涅茨克地区的乌克兰据点 Bakhmut。
dipper_l80_o40: Prigozhin reported that the mercenaries of the Wagner group were still fighting for the Ukrainian town of Bakhmut in the Donetsk region.

src: He acknowledged that the Ukrainian troops were mounting fierce resistance.
mt: 他承认乌克兰军队正在进行激烈的抵抗.
ref: 他承认乌克兰军队正在进行激烈的抵抗。
dipper_l80_o40: He admitted that the Ukrainians were fighting hard.

src: As Russian troops have pushed their attacks in the Donbas, Moscow has also sought to demoralize Ukrainians by leaving them without heat and water in the bitter winter.
mt: 莫斯科也试图通过在严冬中让乌克兰人无暖和水,
ref: 随着俄罗斯军队在顿巴斯推进他们的攻击，莫斯科也试图通过让乌克兰人在严冬环境中缺乏暖气和水源以打击其士气。
dipper_l80_o40: The Russian troops are advancing in the Donbass, and Moscow is trying to demoralize the Ukrainians by leaving them without heat and water in the cold winter.

src: On Friday, Russia launched the 14th round of massive strikes on Ukrainian energy facilities and other vital infrastructure.
mt: 俄罗斯星期五发动第14轮大规模打击乌克兰能源设施和其他重要基础设施.
ref: 周五，俄罗斯对乌克兰能源设施和其他重要基础设施发动了第 14 轮大规模袭击。
dipper_l80_o40: On the 14th of September, Russia launched a new wave of attacks on the energy and communication systems of Ukraine.

src: High-voltage infrastructure facilities were hit in the eastern, western and southern regions, resulting in power outages in some areas.
mt: 东部,西部和南部地区的高压基础设施受到了打击,
ref: 东部、西部和南部地区的高压基础设施遭到袭击，导致一些地区停电。
dipper_l80_o40: The high-voltage power lines in the east, west and south were damaged, causing some areas to lose power.

src: Ukraine's energy company, Ukrenergo, said Saturday that the situation was "difficult but controllable," adding that involved backups to keep up power supplies but noting that power rationing will continue in some areas.
mt: 乌克兰能源公司Ukrenergo周六表示情况"困难但可控", 补充说需要备份以维持电力供应, 但指出在某些地区将继续配电.
ref: 乌克兰能源公司 Ukrenergo 周六表示，情况“困难但可控”，并补充道，此情况下，需要备用以保持电力供应，但指出在一些地区将继续实行限电。
dipper_l80_o40: The situation is difficult, but manageable, the energy company Ukrenergo said on Saturday.

src: Ukraine's military chief, Gen. Valerii Zaluzhnyi, said that Russian forces launched 71 cruise missiles, 35 S-300 missiles and seven Shahed drones between late Thursday and midday Friday, adding that Ukrainian air defenses downed 61 cruise missiles and five drones.
mt: 乌克兰军方首长瓦莱里·扎卢日尼将军说,俄罗斯军队在周四晚间和周五中午之间发射了71枚巡航导弹,35枚S-300导弹和7枚沙赫德无人机,并补充说,乌克兰防空部队击落了61枚巡航导弹和5架无人机.
ref: 乌克兰最高军事长官将军Valerii Zaluzhnyi 表示，俄罗斯军队在周四晚些时候至周五中午期间发射了 71 枚巡航导弹，35 枚 S-300 导弹和 7 架 Shahed 无人机，并补充说，乌克兰防空部队击落了 61 枚巡航导弹和 5 架无人机。
dipper_l80_o40: Then the sapper, who was a Russian, was killed by a shell, and the sapper, who was a Russian, was killed by a shell.

src: The Ukrainian authorities reported more attacks by killer drones later on Friday.
mt: 乌克兰当局在星期五晚些时候报告了更多杀手无人机的袭击.
ref: 乌克兰当局报告称，周五晚些时候，杀手无人机发动了更多袭击。
dipper_l80_o40: Later on Friday, the Ukrainian authorities reported more attacks by killer drones.

src: The Ukrainian air force said the military downed 20 Shahed drones in the evening.
mt: 乌克兰空军表示, 军方在晚上击落了20架沙赫德无人机.
ref: 乌克兰空军表示，军方在晚上击落了 20 架 Shahed 无人机。
dipper_l80_o40: The Ukrainian Air Force reported that it had shot down twenty of the enemy’s drones that evening.

src: Late Friday, Russian military bloggers and some Ukrainian news outlets posted a video showing an attack by a sea drone on a strategic railway bridge in the Odesa region.
mt: 俄罗斯军方博客和一些乌克兰新闻媒体在星期五晚些时候发布了一段视频,
ref: 周五晚些时候，俄罗斯军事博客和一些乌克兰新闻媒体发布了一段视频，显示一架海上无人机袭击了奥德萨地区一座具有战略意义的铁路桥。
dipper_l80_o40: On the evening of the same day, Russian military bloggers and some Ukrainian news agencies published a film of a sea drone attacking a strategic railway bridge in the Odessa region.

src: The grainy video showed a fast-moving object approaching the bridge in Zatoka, about 50 kilometers (30 miles) southwest of Odesa, and exploding in a powerful blast.
mt: 视频显示一个快速移动的物体接近佐托卡桥,
ref: 这段像素较低的视频显示，一个快速移动的物体接近位于敖德萨西南约 50 公里（30 英里）的扎托卡大桥后，卷入强大的爆炸中。
dipper_l80_o40: The smoky haze of the explosion was captured on a grainy film shot by a mobile phone. The object, which was moving at a high speed, approached the Zatoka bridge, about 50 kilometers southwest of Odessa, and exploded with a powerful explosion.

src: The authenticity of the video couldn't be verified.
mt: 视频的真实性无法得到验证.
ref: 该视频的真实性无法得到证实。
dipper_l80_o40: The authenticity of the film could not be verified.

src: The Ukrainian military hasn't commented on the attack, and Serhii Bratchuk, a spokesman for the regional administration, wouldn't confirm the drone attack when he spoke in televised remarks on Saturday.

ref: 乌克兰军方尚未对袭击发表评论，地区行政当局发言人 Serhii Bratchuk 周六在电视讲话中也没有证实无人机袭击。
dipper_l80_o40: The Ukrainian military did not comment on the incident, and Serhii Bratychuk, the spokesman for the regional administration, did not confirm the drone attack in a televised interview on Saturday.

src: The bridge, which was targeted by Russian missile strikes early in the war, serves the railway link to Romania, which is a key conduit for Western arms supplies.
mt: 作为西方武器供应的关键通道, 桥梁是俄罗斯在战争初期的导弹袭击目标,
ref: 这座桥在战争早期成为俄罗斯导弹袭击的目标，它服务于通往罗马尼亚的铁路，是西方武器供应的重要通道。
dipper_l80_o40: The bridge, which the Russians had destroyed in the first days of the war, is the only railway connection between the Danube and Romania, and is the main route for the transport of munitions from the West.

src: Kazakh rescuers pull out 7 survivors and bodies of 19 deceased in Türkiye: 11 February 2023, 12:15

src: 'Yellowstone' actor Q'orianka Kilcher beats fraud charges

src: Attorney Camille Vasquez, who represented Johnny Depp in last year's blockbuster defamation trial, has scored another legal victory - this time with "Yellowstone" actor Q'orianka Kilcher.

src: On Friday, the Los Angeles County district attorney's office cleared Kilcher, 32, of all charges in a workers" compensation fraud case.

ref: 周五，洛杉矶县地方检察官办公室撤销了对 32 岁的基尔彻在一起工人赔偿欺诈案中的所有指控。

dipper_l80_o40: The Los Angeles district attorney's office told The Times on Friday that the case had been dismissed.

src: In July 2022, California officials charged Kilcher with two felony counts of workers" compensation fraud, accusing her of illegally collecting more than $96,000 in disability benefits between October 2019 and September 2021.
mt: 在2022年7月,加利福尼亚官员指控基尔切尔犯有两项工人赔偿欺诈罪,指控她在2019年10月至2021年9月期间非法收取超过96,000美元的残疾福利.

dipper_l80_o40: The Central Bank of Nigeria has dismissed as false, a report that the Governor of the Central Bank, Godwin Emefiele, had blamed the current shortage of the new naira notes on the lack of materials at the Bank of Industry.

src: In a statement issued on Saturday, CBN spokesman, Osita Nwasinobi, said at no time did the CBN governor made such statement during his presentation to the National Council of State at its meeting on Friday, February 10, 2023.

src: Jack Smith should win any privilege fight over Mike Pence subpoena
mt: 杰克史密斯应该赢得任何特权争夺迈克·斯传票
ref: 杰克·史密斯应该赢得任何关于迈克·彭斯传票的特权斗争
dipper_l80_o40: Smith would win any lawsuit against Pence.

src: The news that special counsel Jack Smith has subpoenaed Mike Pence raises the question: How will Team Trump use the courts to muck up this latest development in the Justice Department's probe?
mt: 特别检察官杰克史密斯传唤了斯, 引发了一个问题:特朗普团队将如何利用法庭来破坏司法部调查的最新进展?
ref: 特别顾问杰克·史密斯传唤迈克·彭斯的消息引发了一个问题：特朗普团队将如何利用法院来搞乱司法部调查的最新进展？
dipper_l80_o40: The question is, how will the Trump team use the courts to obstruct the latest development in the investigation?

src: The short answer is that any attempt to scuttle the Pence subpoena on executive privilege grounds should fail.
mt: 简而言之, 任何试图以行政特权为由,
ref: 简单而言，任何以行政特权为由阻挠彭斯传票的企图都应该失败。
dipper_l80_o40: The short answer is that the Pence subpoena should not be quashed on the grounds of executive privilege.

src: First off, there's a threshold question of whether a former president can even claim the privilege.
mt: 首先,有一个门问题,
ref: 首先，有一个门槛问题，前总统是否可以要求这种特权。
dipper_l80_o40: The first question is whether a former president can claim the privilege.

src: Recall that Trump tried and failed to block the House Jan. 6 committee from getting White House records.
mt: 记住特朗普试图阻止众议院1月6日委员会获取白宫记录,
ref: 回想一下，特朗普试图阻止众议院 1 月 6 日委员会获得白宫记录，但失败了。
dipper_l80_o40: Trump tried to block the House Judiciary Committee from obtaining the White House records.

src: The Supreme Court declined to take up Trump's appeal last year, with only Justice Clarence Thomas (husband of 2020 election denier Ginni Thomas) dissenting.
mt: 美国最高法院去年拒绝接受特朗普的上诉,只有法官克拉伦斯·托马斯 (2020年选举否认者吉尼·托马斯的丈夫) 不赞同.
ref: 最高法院去年拒绝受理特朗普的上诉，只有大法官克拉伦斯·托马斯（2020 年选举否认者吉尼·托马斯的丈夫）持异议。
dipper_l80_o40: The Supreme Court refused to hear Trump’s appeal last year, with only Clarence Thomas (the husband of Ginni Thomas, the 2020 election protester) dissenting.

src: But the court left open the question of whether an ex-president can claim privilege, with Justice Brett Kavanaugh suggesting he'd support such a claim.
mt: 但法院没有明确前总统是否可以要求特权,
ref: 但法院对前总统是否可以主张特权的问题没有做出决定，大法官布雷特·卡瓦诺表示他会支持这样的主张。
dipper_l80_o40: The question of the privilege of the former president was left open, and Justice Kavanaugh declared that he would support such a claim.

src: So it's at least unclear whether a former president can claim the privilege, saying nothing of whether the claim would succeed.
mt: 无论如何, 无论如何, 无论如何,
ref: 因此，至少不清楚一位前总统是否可以要求这种特权，更不用说这种要求是否会成功。
dipper_l80_o40: It is therefore not clear whether a former President can claim the privilege, let alone whether he would succeed in doing so.

src: Plus, the Supreme Court appeal over then-President Richard Nixon's attempt to avoid subpoena compliance shows that a vague privilege assertion won't do, and can be overcome by a specific need for evidence.
mt: 美国最高法院对当时的总统尼克松避免遵守传票的诉讼表明, 模糊的特权声明是不够的,
ref: 此外，最高法院对时任总统理查德·尼克松试图避免遵守传票的上诉表明，模糊的特权主张是不行的，可以通过具体的证据需求来克服。
dipper_l80_o40: The case of Richard Nixon, who, as President, refused to obey a subpoena, shows that a general plea of privilege is not sufficient, and that a special need for evidence can overcome it.

src: The court observed in 1974"s United States v. Nixon:
mt: 美国与尼克松案的判决中指出:
ref: 法院在 1974 年的美国诉尼克松案中指出：
dipper_l80_o40: In the case of United States v. Nixon, the court said:

src: ... when the ground for asserting privilege as to subpoenaed materials sought for use in a criminal trial is based only on the generalized interest in confidentiality, it cannot prevail over the fundamental demands of due process of law in the fair administration of criminal justice.
mt: 对于被传唤的材料, 要求在刑事审判中使用的特权, 仅仅是基于对保密的普遍利益,
ref: ...当主张在刑事审判中使用传讯材料的特权的理由仅仅是基于保密的普遍利益时，它不能凌驾于公平刑事司法中正当法律程序的基本要求之上。
dipper_l80_o40: ... when the only basis for asserting a privilege over documents which are the subject of a subpoena and which are to be used in a criminal trial is the general interest in privacy, it cannot prevail over the fundamental requirements of the fair administration of criminal justice.

src: The generalized assertion of privilege must yield to the demonstrated, specific need for evidence in a pending criminal trial.
mt: 普遍的特权要求必须屈服于在正在进行的刑事审判中,
ref: 在未决的刑事审判中，对特权的广义断言必须服从于对证据的明确、具体的需要。
dipper_l80_o40: The general claim of privilege must give way to the specific need for evidence in a criminal case.

src: Therefore, precedent is on the government's side.
mt: 现在, 法律是政府的.
ref: 因此，先例是站在政府一边的。
dipper_l80_o40: The government, therefore, has the advantage of precedent.

src: Of course, however, delays from litigating even a losing issue can be a victory of sorts for Trump.
mt: 尽管如此, 延迟诉讼甚至是输球的案例,
ref: 然而，当然，对特朗普来说，拖延诉讼甚至是一个失败的问题也可能是一种胜利。
dipper_l80_o40: But even if he loses, the delay caused by the lawsuit is a victory of sorts for Trump.

src: But further dampening the odds of a successful privilege claim is the previous rejection of Trump's attempt to block Jan. 6 grand jury testimony.
mt: 但特权权益的成功可能性进一步减弱,
ref: 但进一步降低特权主张成功几率的是，特朗普此前拒绝阻止 1 月 6 日大陪审团作证的企图。

src: As The Washington Post reported in October, that rejection noted that former Pence aide Marc Short, for example, "probably possessed information important to the Justice Department's criminal investigation of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol that was not available from other sources."

src: His reasons for that opposition include both general objections and more specific ones.

src: Generally, he expressed his conviction that our Founding Fathers did not set forth a plan of governance that included federal agencies making laws in place of the legislature.

ref: 总的来说，他表达了他的信念，我们的开国元勋们没有制定一个包括联邦机构代替立法机构制定法律的治理计划。
dipper_l80_o40: He remarked that the Founders had not conceived of a government in which the administrative departments of the government would legislate in place of the legislature.

src: He said, "The Justice Department is there to enforce the law, not to make the law. When you have the executive branch making the law and enforcing the law, then you have have a king, and a kingdom. Our Founders did not call for a king and they did not lay out a kingdom in the Constitution of the United States."
mt: 他说:"司法部是为了执行法律,而不是制定法律. 当你有行政部门制定法律和执行法律时,你就有国王和王国. 我们的创始人没有要求国王,他们没有在美国宪法中设置一个王国. "
ref: 他说，“司法部是来执法的，不是来制定法律的。当行政部门制定法律并执行法律时，就是王国专政的时代了。我们的建国者没有要求实现王国专政，他们也没有在美国宪法中规划一个王国制度。”

src: The force is continuing to search the River Wyre towards the sea at Morecambe Bay, working on one hypothesis that the 45-year-old, from Inskip, could have fallen in.
mt: 警方正在继续搜查摩尔坎贝湾的韦尔河, 根据一个假设,
ref: 警方仍在继续搜索怀尔河流向莫肯贝湾的海域，根据一个假设，这名来自因斯基普的 45 岁男子可能是掉进河里的。
dipper_l80_o40: The police are still searching the river Wyre and the sea at Morecambe Bay, in the hope that the man from Inskip may have fallen in.

src: Their search has been aided by specialists and divers from HM Coastguard, mountain rescue, and Lancashire Fire and Rescue Service, with sniffer dogs, drones, and police helicopters deployed.
mt: 搜寻人员得到了海上警卫队,山地救援,兰开夏消防救援服务的专家和潜水员的帮助,
ref: 他们的搜索得到了英国皇家海岸警卫队、山地救援队和兰开夏郡消防救援队的专家和潜水员的帮助，并部署了嗅探犬、无人机和警用直升机。
dipper_l80_o40: The search was aided by the coastguard, the mountain rescue service, the Lancashire fire service, and the police, who used dogs, drones, and police helicopters.

src: Ms Bulley vanished while walking her springer spaniel Willow near the river, shortly after dropping her daughters, aged six and nine, at school.
mt: 布利女士在河边走她的小狗威洛时失踪,
ref: 布莉女士在把她六岁和九岁的女儿送到学校后不久，在河边遛她的斯宾格猎犬柳树时失踪了。
dipper_l80_o40: Then, after a few minutes, she was gone, and she had not returned. She had taken her two daughters, aged six and nine, to school, and then she had gone to walk her dog, a springer spaniel called Willow.

src: The mortgage adviser's phone was found on a bench overlooking the river, still connected to a work call.
mt: 房贷顾问的手机被发现在一张俯河的长椅上, 仍然与工作电话相连.
ref: 这位抵押贷款顾问的手机被发现放在一张俯瞰河流的长椅上，仍然连接着一个工作电话。
dipper_l80_o40: The telephone of the broker was found on a bench by the river, still ringing.

src: Her partner, Paul Ansell said he wants to keep "all options open" about her disappearance, but his "gut instinct" tells him she is not in the river.
mt: 她的伴侣保罗·安塞尔说他希望保持"所有选择的开放"关于她的失踪,
ref: 她的伴侣保罗·安塞尔说，他希望对她的失踪保持“所有选项开放”，但他的“直觉”告诉他，她不在河里。
dipper_l80_o40: Paul Ansell, her partner, said he was keeping all the possibilities open, but his instinct told him that she was not in the river.

src: He described Ms Bulley as "fun," "loving," "the most loyal friend you could ever have" and an "exceptional mum" who "absolutely adores our girls."
mt: 他描述布利女士是"有趣的","有爱的", "你能拥有的最忠诚的朋友",
ref: 他将布莉女士描述为“有趣”、“可爱”、“你能拥有的最忠诚的朋友”以及“非常爱我们的女儿”的“杰出的妈妈”。
dipper_l80_o40: He called her a “jolly, loving woman,” “the most faithful friend one could have,” “an excellent mother,” who “adores our girls.”

src: "She's just a pillar of strength to our family and without her, the hole is bigger than you can possibly imagine," he told 5 News.
mt: "她只是我们家庭的支柱, 没有她, 洞是比你想象的要大", 他告诉5新闻.
ref: 他告诉 5 News：“她是我们家的支柱，没有她，这个深渊比你想象的还要大。”
dipper_l80_o40: “She is the pillar of our family, and without her, we are in a hole that is bigger than you can imagine,” he told Channel Five.

src: Mr Ansell said that although the family is going through "unprecedented hell," hope that his partner will be found is "stronger than ever."
mt: 尽管这个家庭正经历"前所未有的地狱", 但希望他的伴侣能被找到,
ref: 安塞尔先生说，虽然这个家庭正在经历“前所未有的地狱”，但找到他的伴侣的希望“比以往任何时候都强烈”。
dipper_l80_o40: Mr. Ansell said that although the family was going through an “unheard of hell,” the hope that his wife would be found was “stronger than ever.”

src: Police have discounted foul play and are treating the incident as a missing person inquiry.
mt: 警方已经排除了凶手行为, 并将此事件视为失踪人员调查.
ref: 警方不认为这是谋杀，并将此事件视为失踪人口调查。
dipper_l80_o40: The police do not suspect foul play and are treating the case as a missing person.

src: On Thursday, the focus of their search switched from St Michael's to around 10 miles downstream where the river empties into the sea at Morecambe Bay, with patrol and rescue boats spotted in the area.
mt: 周四, 他们的搜索重点从圣迈克尔转移到大约10英里下游,
ref: 周四，他们的搜索重点从圣迈克尔转移到下游约 10 英里处，那里是河流在莫克姆湾入海的地方，巡逻队和救援船在该地区开展工作。
dipper_l80_o40: On Thursday the search was transferred from St. Michael's to the mouth of the river, about ten miles below, where the sea is poured into Morecambe Bay. Search-vessels were seen in the neighborhood.

src: East Germany's last communist leader dies at 95
mt: 东德最后一位共产党领袖95岁去世
ref: 东德最后一位共产党领导人去世，享年 95 岁
dipper_l80_o40: The last of the Communists of East Germany, who died at the age of 95, was the former Minister of State Security, who was buried in the city of Halle.

src: BERLIN (AP) - Hans Modrow, who served as East Germany's last communist leader during a turbulent tenure that ended in the country's first and only free election, has died.
mt: 德国的最后一个共产党领袖, 在这个国家第一个和唯一的自由选举结束的动荡时期,
ref: 柏林（美联社）-汉斯·莫德罗，东德最后一位共产党领导人，在混乱的任期内，结束了该国第一次也是唯一一次自由选举，与世长辞。

src: He was 95.
mt: 他95岁.
ref: 享年 95 岁。
dipper_l80_o40: He was ninety-five.

src: Modrow died early Saturday, the Left party parliamentary group tweeted.
mt: 莫德罗在周六早些时候去世,

src: "The entire peaceful course of establishing German unity was precisely a special achievement of his," the Left wrote on Twitter."That will remain his political legacy."
mt: 德国的统一是他的特别成就, 这将是他的政治遗产.
ref: 左派人士在 Twitter 上写道：“建立德国统一的整个和平进程正是他的一项特殊成就，”“这将成为他的政治遗产。”
dipper_l80_o40: “The whole peaceful process of German unity was his special achievement,” the Left wrote on its Twitter page. “That will be his political legacy.”

src: During 16 years as communist party chief in Dresden, starting in 1973, Modrow built a reputation as an anti-establishment figure.
mt: 在德累斯顿担任共产党首席的16年里,
ref: 从 1973 年开始，在担任德累斯顿共产党总书记的 16 年间，莫德罗建立了反体制人物的名声。
dipper_l80_o40: In the years of his service as the chairman of the Communist Party in Dresden, from 1973 to 1989, he was able to establish a reputation as an anti-establishment figure.

src: He rejected party perks and insisted on living in a normal apartment.
mt: 他拒绝参加派对,坚持住在普通公寓里.
ref: 他拒绝派对津贴，坚持住在普通公寓里。
dipper_l80_o40: He refused to live in a special apartment and insisted on living in a normal apartment.

src: A post in East Germany's top leadership eluded him until he was made prime minister, a position that previously carried little clout, in November 1989 - days after the fall of the Berlin Wall.
mt: 东德最高领导层的职位在1989年11月,在柏林墙倒塌几天后,他被任命为总理,这个职位以前几乎没有影响力.
ref: 直到 1989 年 11 月，柏林墙倒塌后几天，他被任命为总理，这是一个以前没有什么影响力的职位。
dipper_l80_o40: He was not able to get a position in the East German government until November 1989, when he was appointed Prime Minister, a position that had been of little importance until then.

src: When hard-line leader Egon Krenz and his ruling Politburo resigned in early December, Modrow emerged as East Germany's top political figure.
mt: 莫德罗成为东德的最高政治人物.
ref: 当强硬派领导人埃贡·克伦茨和他的政治局在 12 月初辞职时，莫德罗成为东德的最高政治人物。
dipper_l80_o40: In the early days of December, when the hard-liner Egon Krenz and his ruling Politburo resigned, Modrow became the most important political figure in East Germany.

src: But the communists could no longer call the shots on their own.
mt: 现在,共产党人已经无法自主掌控.
ref: 但是共产主义者再也不能独自发号施令了。
dipper_l80_o40: But the Communists could no longer act alone.

src: The following month, he agreed to share power with the increasingly vocal opposition and moved up East Germany's landmark first free election to March 1990, amid growing unrest.
mt: 接下来的一个月, 他同意与日益强烈的反对派分享权力, 并将东德的第一个具有里程碑意义的自由选举推迟到1990年3月,
ref: 接下来的一个月，他同意与呼声渐高的反对派共享权力，并将东德具有里程碑意义的第一次自由选举提前到 1990 年 3 月，当时动荡日益加剧。
dipper_l80_o40: In the following month he agreed to share power with the opposition, which was becoming more and more active, and he brought forward the first free elections to March of that year.

src: Even as pro-democracy rallies rapidly took on a pro-unification flavor, the communists initially had opposed talk of reunification.
mt: 尽管民主派集会迅速成为支持统一的口味,
ref: 支持民主的集会迅速发展，带有支持统一的色彩，而共产党最初反对统一的说法。
dipper_l80_o40: The Communists, however, were opposed to any talk of reunification.

src: In February 1990, however, Modrow urged talks with West Germany toward an eventual "united fatherland" that would be independent of military blocs and governed by a joint parliament in Berlin.
mt: 1990年2月,莫德罗敦促与西德进行谈判, 争取最终建立一个"统一的祖国", 独立于军事集团, 在柏林由联合议会治理.
ref: 然而，1990 年 2 月，莫德罗敦促与西德进行谈判，以最终建立一个独立于军事集团、由柏林联合议会管理的“统一的祖国”。
dipper_l80_o40: In February, however, Modrow began to advocate a unified Germany, independent of the military blocs, with a single parliament in Berlin.

src: Modrow headed the election campaign of the restyled communists, the Party of Democratic Socialism, but his personal popularity was not enough to prevent them finishing as only the third-strongest party, with 16 percent support.
mt: 莫德罗领导了重新设计的共产党的竞选活动, 但他的个人声誉不足以阻止他们以16%的支持率成为第三强政党.
ref: 莫德罗领导了重建后的共产主义者民主社会主义党的竞选活动，但他的个人声望不足以阻止他们仅以 16% 的支持率成为第三大党。
dipper_l80_o40: The Communists, renamed the Democratic Socialist Party, had a candidate in the elections, but even his popularity did not help them to win more than 16 per cent of the vote.

src: The winner was an alliance of conservative parties that favored quick reunification and was backed by the government of West German leader Helmut Kohl.
mt: 赢得了保守党的联盟, 支持迅速统一, 得到西德领导人赫尔穆特·科尔政府的支持.
ref: 获胜者是主张快速统一的保守派政党联盟，并得到西德领导人赫尔穆特·科尔政府的支持。
dipper_l80_o40: The conservative parties, which were in favour of a speedy reunification, were victorious.

src: Germany reunited under Kohl's leadership and as a NATO member on Oct. 3, 1990, less than a year after the fall of the Berlin Wall.
mt: 德国在科尔的领导下,在1990年10月3日重新团结,成为北约成员,
ref: 1990 年 10 月 3 日，在柏林墙倒塌不到一年后，德国在美国柯尔百货公司的领导下重新统一，并成为北约成员国。
dipper_l80_o40: On 3 October, less than a year after the fall of the Wall, Germany was reunited under the leadership of Chancellor Helmut Kohl and as a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

src: Modrow became a member of the united parliament, where he sat until 1994, and honorary chairman of the post-communist PDS - the predecessor of today's opposition Left party. From 1999 to 2004, he was a member of the European Parliament.
mt: 莫德罗成为联合议会的成员,直到1994年,并担任后共产党PDS的荣誉主席 - - 今天的反对党左翼党的前身.从1999年到2004年,他是欧洲议会的成员.
ref: 莫德罗成为了联合议会的成员，直到 1994 年，他还是后共产主义社会民主党的名誉主席，该党是今天的反对党左翼党的前身。从 1999 年到 2004 年，他是欧洲议会的成员。
dipper_l80_o40: In 1989 he was elected to the new parliament, where he remained until 1994, and was the honorary chairman of the PDS, the successor party to the Communist Party. In 1999 he was elected to the European Parliament.

src: Modrow's past under hard-line communist rule landed him in court several years after reunification.
mt: 莫德罗在强硬的共产主义政权下的过去,
ref: 莫德罗过去在共产党的强硬统治下，在两德统一几年后被送上法庭。
dipper_l80_o40: After the reunification of Germany, the past of the hard-line communists, who had been in power for many years, was to be brought before the court.

src: In 1995, a court convicted him of inciting the falsification of results in May 1989 local elections in Dresden.
mt: 1995年, 法庭判定他煽动伪造1989年5月德累斯顿地方选举的结果.
ref: 1995 年，法院判定他在 1989 年 5 月德累斯顿地方选举中煽动伪造结果。
dipper_l80_o40: In the year of our Lord 1924, he was convicted by a court of law of having incited the people of Dresden to vote in the municipal elections of May, 1989.

src: It handed him a nine-month suspended sentence and a fine.
mt: 判处他9个月的缓刑和罚款.
ref: 法院判处他 9 个月缓刑和罚款。
dipper_l80_o40: He was given a suspended sentence of nine months and a fine.

src: Modrow claimed that the trial was politically motivated and asserted that its outcome would aggravate divisions between east and west Germans.
mt: 莫德罗声称审判是出于政治动机,并断言其结果将加剧东德和西德之间的分歧.
ref: 莫德罗声称审判是出于政治动机，并断言其结果将加剧东德和西德之间的分歧。
dipper_l80_o40: The trial was a political one, he said, and the verdict would only deepen the rift between East and West Germany.

src: His attorney argued that he had made amends for previous injustices by overseeing free elections as prime minister.
mt: 据他的律师称,
ref: 他的律师辩称，他作为总理监督了自由选举，从而弥补了之前的不公。
dipper_l80_o40: The defence counsel argued that he had made up for his past injustices by presiding over free elections as prime minister.

src: Later in life, Modrow served on the council of elders of the Left party.
mt: 后来,莫德罗成为左翼党的长老委员会成员.
ref: 晚年，莫德罗在左翼政党长老理事会任职。
dipper_l80_o40: Later, in his life, he served on the Council of Elders of the Left Party.

src: "Hans was a deeply sincere and combative socialist," tweeted Dietmar Bartsch, the chairman of the Left party parliamentary group.
mt: "汉斯是一个非常诚实和积极的社会主义者",
ref: 左翼党议会党团主席迪特马尔·巴奇在推特上表示：“汉斯是一个非常真诚和好斗的社会主义者。”
dipper_l80_o40: “Hans was a genuinely committed and combative socialist,” Dietmar Bartsch, the chairman of the parliamentary group of the Left Party, wrote on his Twitter account.

src: "Until old age he was an important adviser in our party, whose wisdom will be missed."
mt: "他一直是我们党的重要顾问,
ref: “直到晚年，他一直是我党的重要顾问，我们将怀念他的智慧。”
dipper_l80_o40: “He was a great adviser to us until his old age. We shall miss his wisdom.”

src: Indian govt withdraws appeal to hug cows on Valentine's Day after criticism
mt: 印度政府在受到批评后撤回了情人节拥抱牛的呼吁
ref: 印度政府撤回在情人节拥抱奶牛的呼吁
dipper_l80_o40: The Indian government has withdrawn its proposal to hug cows on Valentine’s Day.

src: Hugging a cow on Valentine's Day is no longer being encouraged by the Indian government - despite it previously asking people to do so to promote Hindu values.
mt: 印度政府不再鼓励人们在情人节拥抱牛,
ref: 印度政府不再鼓励在情人节拥抱一头奶牛，尽管此前政府曾要求人们这样做，以推广印度教价值观。
dipper_l80_o40: The government of India has decided to stop encouraging people to hug cows on Valentine’s Day. It had earlier asked people to hug cows to promote Hinduism.

src: The Animal Welfare Board of India (AWBI) retracted its "Cow Hug Day" appeal after it attracted criticism from political rivals and social media users.
mt: 印度动物福利委员会 (AWBI) 撤回了"牛拥抱日"的呼吁,
ref: 印度（AWBI）动物福利委员会撤回了其“抱牛日”的呼吁，此前该呼吁招致了政治对手和社交媒体用户的批评。
dipper_l80_o40: The Animal Welfare Board of India (AWBI) had a cow hug day on the first of May. But it was withdrawn after it was criticized by political parties and social media.

src: The Indian government department had called on citizens to deviate from Western romantic gestures celebrated on Valentine's Day.
mt: 印度政府部门呼吁公民在情人节时避免西方的浪漫手势.
ref: 印度政府部门呼吁公民在情人节这天不要做出西方的浪漫举动。
dipper_l80_o40: The Indian government had issued a statement advising its citizens to shun the Western custom of celebrating St. Valentine’s Day.

src: Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay, a political analyst, said the call to hug cows had been "absolutely crazy, defying logic."
mt: 尼兰·穆科帕德亚耶 (Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay) 是一位政治分析师,
ref: 政治分析家 Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay 表示，拥抱奶牛的呼吁“绝对疯狂，违背逻辑。”
dipper_l80_o40: The cow-hugging mania was a craze that defied all logic.

src: He added that the decision to withdraw the appeal was more "to prevent the politics of Hindutva [Hindu nationalism] from being ridiculed in the face of severe criticism from all quarters."
mt: 他补充说,撤回上诉的决定更多是为了"防止印度教的政治被嘲笑,
ref: 他补充说，撤回上诉的决定更多的是为了“防止印度教民族主义（Hindutva）的政治在面临来自各方的严厉批评时受到嘲笑。”
dipper_l80_o40: “We have taken this decision to prevent the Hindutva politics from being ridiculed in the face of the severe criticism it has been subjected to from all sides,” he said.

src: The AWBI reneged on its appeal on Friday saying it "stands withdrawn."
mt: 美国联邦调查局 (AWBI) 周五拒绝上诉,
ref: AWBI 周五否认了其上诉，称其“撤回”
dipper_l80_o40: On Friday, the AWBI withdrew its request.

src: It was only on Wednesday when its statement read that "hugging cows [would] bring emotional richness and increase individual and collective happiness."
mt: 只有周三, 官方声明才说"拥抱牛会带来情感丰富, 增加个人和集体的幸福".
ref: 直到周三，它的声明才写道“拥抱奶牛（将）带来丰富的情感，增加个人和集体福祉。”
dipper_l80_o40: On Wednesday, the Agricultural Bureau issued a statement that “Hugs of cows would enrich the emotions and increase the happiness of the individual and the community.”

src: More on India
mt: 更多关于印度
ref: 更多关于印度的信息
dipper_l80_o40: More on India

src: It added that the cow is the "backbone of Indian culture and rural economy... because of its nourishing nature like [a] mother."
mt: 牛是"印度文化和农村经济的支柱......因为它像母一样滋养人".
ref: 它补充说，奶牛是“印度文化和农村经济的支柱”...因为它像母亲一样有滋养的天性。”
dipper_l80_o40: The cow is the pillar of Indian culture and agriculture. It is the mother of all animals.

src: There were mixed reactions to the initial announcement as some posted videos of cows rejecting being hugged and charging off.
mt: 部分人发布了一些牛拒绝被拥抱并逃跑的视频.
ref: 人们对最初的声明反应不一，一些人上传了奶牛拒绝被拥抱并逃跑的视频。
dipper_l80_o40: The initial reaction to the news was mixed. Some people posted videos of cows snubbing the hugs and running away.

src: Others wanted to clarify that the appeal was more for following one's own culture, as opposed to "blindly" following Western values.
mt: 其他人则想澄清, 呼吁更多的是遵循自己的文化, 而不是"盲目"遵循西方价值观.
ref: 其他人希望澄清，呼吁更多的是遵循自己的文化，而不是“盲目”遵循西方价值观。
dipper_l80_o40: Others wished to make it clear that the appeal was not so much to the people to follow their own culture as to reject the “blind” imitation of Western culture.

src: Young Indians typically spend Valentine's Day crowding parks and restaurants, exchanging gifts and holding parties.
mt: 印度年轻人通常在情人节期间挤在公园和餐馆,
ref: 年轻的印度人通常在拥挤的公园和餐馆里度过情人节，交换礼物并举行聚会。
dipper_l80_o40: Young men and women in India, on the day of St. Valentine, throng the public gardens and the restaurants, exchange gifts, and hold parties.

src: Cow cuddling is nothing new either - with it being considered therapeutic in parts of the world, and in The Netherlands where it is known as "koe knuffelen."
mt: 牛的拥抱也不是什么新鲜事 - - 在世界某些地方被认为是治疗的, 在荷兰被称为"koe knuffelen".
ref: 拥抱奶牛也不是什么新鲜事——在世界的一些地方，它被认为是一种治疗方法，在荷兰，它被称为“koe knuffelen”。
dipper_l80_o40: Cow-kissing is not a new thing either. In some countries it is considered a cure, and in Holland it is called ‘knuffelen’.

src: Devout Hindus worship the cow - known as gau mata, or "mother cow" - and most states in India have banned cow slaughter.
mt: 印度的虔诚印度教徒崇拜牛, 称为"母牛" (gau mata), 印度大多数州禁止杀牛.
ref: 虔诚的印度教徒崇拜这种被称为 gau mata 或“母牛”的牛，印度大多数邦都禁止宰杀牛。
dipper_l80_o40: Cows are sacred to Hindus. Cows are called ‘Mother Cow’. Cows are not slaughtered in most states of India.

src: In recent years, certain Hindu hard-liners have raided shops selling Valentine's Day items, burned cards and gifts, and chased hand-holding couples out of restaurants and parks, insisting that the day goes against traditional values and promotes promiscuity.
mt: 最近几年,某些印度教强硬派袭击了卖情人节物品的商店,烧毁卡片和礼物,并把手拉手的夫妇赶出餐馆和公园, 坚称这一天违背了传统价值观, 促进了乱伦.
ref: 近年来，某些印度教强硬派袭击了出售情人节商品的商店，焚烧卡片和礼物，并将手拉手的情侣赶出餐馆和公园，坚称这一天违背传统价值观，助长滥交。
dipper_l80_o40: In the recent past, some Hindu fundamentalists have been burning Valentine’s Day cards and gifts, and chasing couples out of restaurants and parks. They claim that the day is a violation of the sacred law of marriage and that it encourages promiscuity.

src: Hindu nationalist groups such as Shiv Sena and Bajrang Dal have said such raids help reassert a Hindu identity.
mt: 印度民族主义团体如希夫塞纳和巴杰朗达尔表示,
ref: 印度教民族主义团体，如 Shiv Sena 和 Bajrang Dal 说，这种袭击有助于重申印度教的身份。
dipper_l80_o40: The Bajrang Dal and the Shiv Sena have been claiming that such raids are a way of reclaiming the Hindu identity.

src: Critics of Prime Minister Narendra Modi say his government has pushed a Hindu agenda, seeking the religion's supremacy in a secular nation known for its diversity.
mt: 印度政府在一个以多元化而闻名的世俗国家中寻求宗教至高无上的地位.
ref: 总理纳伦德拉·莫迪的批评者说，莫迪政府推动了一项印度教议程，在一个以多样性著称的世俗国家寻求宗教至高无上的地位。
dipper_l80_o40: Hindutva is a political party in India, which is a Hindu nation. It is a party that is trying to establish the supremacy of Hinduism in the country.

src: While Hindus comprise almost 80% of the nearly 1.4 billion people, Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists and Jains account for most of the rest.
mt: 印度教占近14亿人口的近80%, 穆斯林,基督徒,锡克教徒,佛教徒和教徒占其余大部分.
ref: 虽然印度教徒占近 14 亿人口的近 80%，但穆斯林、基督徒、锡克教徒、佛教徒和耆那教徒占其余的大部分。
dipper_l80_o40: Hindus constitute about eighty per cent of the population of India, the rest being Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, Parsis, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees, Parsees,

src: Pedestrian dies in hospital after crash with car in Cowdenbeath as man arrested
mt: 路人死在医院后与汽车在考登比斯撞击,作为一个人被捕
ref: 在 Cowdenbeath 与汽车相撞后，行人在医院死亡，男子被捕
dipper_l80_o40: Cowdenbeath, Scotland.

src: A pedestrian has died following a collision with a car in Fife.
mt: 一名行人因与汽车相撞而死亡.
ref: 一名行人在法夫与一辆汽车相撞后死亡。
dipper_l80_o40: A PERSON has been killed by a collision with a motor-car in Fife.

src: The 38-year-old female was rushed to Victoria Hospital in Kirkcaldy following the crash on Broad Street in Cowdenbeath on Friday around 1.30pm.
mt: 这位38岁的女性在周五下午1点30分左右在Cowdenbeath的Broad Street发生事故后被赶往Kirkcaldy的维多利亚医院.
ref: 这位 38 岁的女性在周五下午 1：30 左右考登比思的布罗德街发生车祸后被紧急送往柯克卡尔迪的维多利亚医院
dipper_l80_o40: The accident happened on Broad Street, Cowdenbeath, on Friday, about half-past one. The woman, who was 38 years old, was taken to the Victoria Hospital in Kirkcaldy.

src: A 24-year-old man has subsequently been arrested in connection with the crash.
mt: 随后一名24岁的男子因与这起事故有关而被捕.
ref: 一名二十四岁男子其后因涉嫌与意外有关而被捕。
dipper_l80_o40: A man of twenty-four was arrested in connection with the accident.

src: Police are appealing for any witnesses or anyone with dash-cam footage to come forward.
mt: 警方呼吁任何目击者或任何有仪表盘摄像头录像的人,
ref: 警方呼吁任何目击者或任何有监控录像的人站出来。
dipper_l80_o40: Police are appealing for witnesses and anyone with a dash-cam to come forward.

src: Sergeant Lee Walkingshaw said: "Our enquiries are ongoing and we are appealing for anyone who was in the area and who witnessed the crash to get in touch."
mt: 警官李·沃金肖说:"我们的调查仍在进行中,
ref: Sergeant Lee 中士表示：“我们的调查仍在进行中，我们呼吁任何在该地区的人和目睹坠机事件的人保持联系。”
dipper_l80_o40: “Our inquiries are still in progress, and we are appealing to anyone who was in the vicinity and who may have witnessed the collision to contact us.”

src: I would also appeal to anyone who was driving in the area and who may have dash-cam footage which could assist our investigation to contact us.
mt: 我也呼吁任何在该地区开车的人, 谁可能有仪表盘摄像头的录像,
ref: 我也呼吁在该地区开车的人和可能有 dash-cam 镜头的人与我们联系，这可能有助于我们的调查。
dipper_l80_o40: I would also like to ask any drivers who were in the area and who may have a recording of the accident on their car's camera to contact us.

src: "Anyone who can help is asked to call Police Scotland on 101, quoting incident number 1638 of Friday, February 10, 2023."
mt: "任何有帮助的人请致电苏格兰警察101, 引用2023年2月10日星期五的事件号码1638".
ref: “任何能提供帮助的人都被要求拨打苏格兰警察 101，引用 2023 年 2 月 10 日星期五的事件编号 1638。”
dipper_l80_o40: “Anyone with information is asked to call Police Scotland on 101 and quote the incident number 1638 of Friday, 10 February, 2023.”

src: IN NUMBERS: The Oslo boroughs where the most foreigners live
mt: 总数:奥斯陆的外国居民最多的地区
ref: 在数字中：外国人最多的奥斯陆行政区
dipper_l80_o40: Numbers: Oslo districts with the most foreigners

src: Roughly 177,000 of Oslo's 634,000's residents have immigrated to Norway from other countries.
mt: 约有177,000名奥斯陆634,000名居民从其他国家移民到挪威.
ref: 奥斯陆 63.4 万居民中，大约有 17.7 万人从其他国家移民到挪威。
dipper_l80_o40: Oslo has a population of 634,000, of whom about a quarter, or 177,000, are foreigners.

src: When you include those born in Oslo to foreign parents, the proportion of those who are immigrants or have an immigrant background rises to more than a third.
mt: 移民或移民背景的人口比例高达三分之一以上.
ref: 如果把出生在奥斯陆、父母是外国人的人计算在内，移民或有移民背景的人的比例将超过三分之一。
dipper_l80_o40: When one includes those born in Oslo of foreign parents, the proportion of those who are either foreigners or have foreign origins rises to more than a third.

src: In Oslo, citizens from Asia, including Turkey, made up the largest immigrant group, with over 62,985 of these nationals living in the city, according to figures from the national data agency Statistics Norway (SSB).
mt: 根据国家数据机构挪威统计局 (SSB) 的数据,在奥斯陆,包括土耳其在内的亚洲公民是最大的移民群体,其中超过62,985名这些国民生活在城市.
ref: 根据国家数据机构挪威统计局（SSB）的数据，在奥斯陆，包括土耳其在内的亚洲公民构成了最大的移民群体，其中超过 62985 人生活在这座城市。
dipper_l80_o40: In Oslo, the largest group of foreigners was Asians, including Turks, with a total of 62,985 inhabitants, according to the figures of the State Bureau of Statistics.

src: After that, citizens from the EU, EEA and the UK made up the second largest group, accounting for not far off 10 percent of the city's population.
mt: 欧盟,欧洲经济区和英国的公民是第二大群体,
ref: 之后，来自欧盟、欧洲经济区和英国的公民组成了第二大群体，占该市人口的 10%。
dipper_l80_o40: The second largest group of foreigners in the city is the citizens of the European Union, the European Economic Area and the United Kingdom, who together make up almost ten percent of the population.

src: Africans made up the third largest group of immigrants in Oslo, with 28,020 people from Africa living in Oslo.
mt: 非洲人是奥斯陆第三大移民群体,来自非洲的28 020人居住在奥斯陆.
ref: 非洲人是奥斯陆第三大移民群体，有 28020 名非洲人居住在奥斯陆。
dipper_l80_o40: Africans were the third largest group of foreigners in Oslo, with a total of 28,020 inhabitants.

src: Europeans from countries that aren't part of the UK, EU or EEA were the fourth largest group, accounting for 15,566 Oslo residents.
mt: 来自非英国,欧盟或欧洲经济区国家的欧洲人是第四大群体,占奥斯陆居民的15566人.
ref: 来自不属于英国、欧盟或欧洲经济区的欧洲人是第四大群体，有 15566 名奥斯陆居民。
dipper_l80_o40: The fourth largest group was the Europeans from countries outside the UK, the EU and the EEA, with 15,566 inhabitants.

src: From here, the size of the groups drops significantly.
mt: 群体的规模从此就会大幅下降.
ref: 从这里开始，群体的规模显著下降。
dipper_l80_o40: From this point on the size of the groups is considerably reduced.

src: For example, there were just shy of 7,000 citizens from South American countries in 2022, while there was a smidge over 3,000 nationals hailing from North and Central America.
mt: 例如,在2022年,南美国家只有不到7,000名公民,而来自北美和中美洲的公民则少不到3000人.
ref: 例如，2022 年，来自南美国家的公民不到 7000 人，而来自北美和中美洲的公民略多于 3000 人。
dipper_l80_o40: In 2022, for example, there were 7,020 citizens from South America, and 3,021 citizens from North and Central America.

src: Meanwhile, there were less than 700 people from Oceania in Oslo.
mt: 欧斯陆的海洋居民不到700.
ref: 与此同时，奥斯陆只有不到 700 名来自大洋洲的人。
dipper_l80_o40: In Oslo there were less than seven hundred people from Oceania.

src: Alna, in the northeast of the city, was the borough with the most foreign residents.
mt: 城市东北部的阿尔纳是最多外籍居民的区.
ref: 位于城市东北部的阿尔纳是外国居民最多的行政区。
dipper_l80_o40: The borough of Alna, in the northeast of the city, was the one where the most foreigners lived.

src: Some 18,257 foreign residents were registered as living there in 2022.
mt: 在2022年,约有18,257名外国居民被注册为居住在该国.
ref: 2022 年，约有 18257 名外国居民登记居住在那里。
dipper_l80_o40: In 2022, there were 18,257 foreigners living in the city.

src: Afterwards, trendy Grünerløkka, located reasonably centrally, had the second highest number of foreign residents, with 17,631.
mt: 之后,位于相当中心的时尚格鲁内尔洛卡 (Grünerløkka) 拥有第二高的外国居民人数,为17,631人.
ref: 之后，时尚的 grünerl kka 位于市中心，拥有 17631 名外国居民，位居第二。
dipper_l80_o40: Then came the fashionable Grünerlkka, situated fairly centrally, with 17,631 foreigners.

src: Gamle Oslo also had a significant immigrant population, with 17,631 people living there after moving from another country.
mt: 旧奥斯陆也拥有大量移民人口,其中有17,631人从其他国家搬到这里.
ref: Gamle Oslo 也有大量的移民人口，有 17631 人从另一个国家移居到这里。
dipper_l80_o40: Old Oslo also had a considerable number of foreigners, 17,631 of whom had come from abroad.

src: Statistics Norway's figures showed that foreigners were scattered all over the city's districts, as Søndre Nordstrand, the borough furthest south in Oslo, had over 14,000 immigrants registered there.
mt: 挪威统计局的数据显示,外国人分散在城市各个地区,因为奥斯陆最南端的Søndre Nordstrand市区有超过14,000名移民登记.
ref: 挪威统计局的数据显示，外国人分散在奥斯陆的各个区，奥斯陆最南端的圣德勒诺斯特兰德区有超过 14000 名移民在那里登记。
dipper_l80_o40: Statistics Norway’s figures showed that foreigners were scattered all over the city districts, and that Sndre Nordstrand, the most southern district in Oslo, had more than fourteen thousand foreigners registered there.

src: Many immigrants also lived in sought-after areas, as Frogner was the district with the fifth most foreigners.
mt: 许多移民也住在受欢迎的地区,因为弗罗格纳是第五大外国人区.
ref: 许多移民也住在受欢迎的地区，因为 Frogner 是外国人第五多的地区。
dipper_l80_o40: The most sought-after districts were also inhabited by many foreigners, for Frogner was the fifth district with the most foreigners.

src: After that, Stovner, Bjerke, Grorud, Østensjø and Sagene made up the rest of the ten districts in Oslo with the most residents from another country.
mt: 斯托夫纳,比尔克,格罗鲁德,奥斯斯约和萨格内成为奥斯陆十个地区中最多外籍居民的地区.
ref: 之后，Stovner、Bjerke、Grorud、stensjø和 Sagene 组成了奥斯陆其他十个区，来自其他国家的居民最多。
dipper_l80_o40: Then came Stovner, Bjerke, Grorud, stensjö and Sagene, the ten districts in Oslo with the most foreigners.

src: At the other end of the spectrum, just 184 foreign residents called Marka home, and just over 700 lived in the city's central borough.
mt: 只有184名外国人住在马卡,
ref: 在另一端，只有 184 名外国居民称马尔卡为家，只有 700 多名居住在该市的中心区。
dipper_l80_o40: The foreign population of Marka was 184, and of the central district of the city 707.

src: Ullern, Vestre Aker and Nordstrand made up the other boroughs with the fewest foreign residents.
mt: 乌勒恩,维斯特拉·阿克和诺德斯特兰德是其他最少外国人居住的市区.
ref: 乌尔恩、维斯特雷·阿克和诺斯特兰德是其他外来人口最少的行政区。
dipper_l80_o40: The other districts with the fewest foreigners were Ullern, Vestre Aker, and Nordstrand.

src: However, these boroughs had significantly more immigrants living there than in central Oslo and Marka.
mt: 然而,这些区的移民人口明显高于奥斯陆中心和马卡.
ref: 然而，这些自治市的移民数量明显多于奥斯陆市中心和马尔卡市。
dipper_l80_o40: These boroughs, however, had a much larger proportion of foreigners than the city and Marka.

src: Those from EU and EEA countries and those from the United Kingdom mostly lived in Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo and St. Hanshaugen.
mt: 来自欧盟和欧洲经济区国家的移民和来自英国的移民主要居住在弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,老奥斯陆和圣汉舒根.
ref: 来自欧盟和欧洲经济区国家的人以及来自联合王国的人大多居住在弗洛格纳、格吕内尔洛卡、加姆勒奥斯陆和圣汉绍根。
dipper_l80_o40: The foreigners from the European Union and the British were mostly located in Frogner, Grnland, Old Oslo and St. Hanshaugen.

src: Meanwhile, while plenty of citizens from Asia, including Turkey, also resided in Game Oslo (5,837), the majority were registered as living in the boroughs of Alna, Stovner and Søndre Nordstrand.
mt: 虽然有很多来自亚洲的公民,包括土耳其,也居住在奥斯陆 (5837人),但大多数人被注册为居住在阿尔纳,斯托夫纳和索恩德诺德斯特兰德的城区.
ref: 与此同时，虽然包括土耳其在内的许多亚洲公民也居住在 Game Oslo （5837 人），但大多数人登记居住在阿尔纳、斯托弗纳和桑得雷·诺斯特兰德区。
dipper_l80_o40: Then, though there were many citizens of Asia, and of Turkey, in the city of Oslo, 5,837, the majority were registered in the parishes of Alna, Stovner, and Sndre Nordstrand.

src: Gamle Oslo and Alna were the two parts of the city where the largest number of immigrants from Africa lived, along with Stovner, Grünerløkka and Søndre Norstrand.
mt: 旧奥斯陆和阿尔纳是城市的两个地区,那里的非洲移民人数最多,还有斯托夫纳,格鲁纳洛卡和索恩德尔诺斯特兰德.
ref: Gamle Oslo 和 Alna 是该市来自非洲的移民人数最多的两个地区，此外还有 Stovner、grünerl kka 和 Sø ndre Norstrand。
dipper_l80_o40: Old Oslo and Alna were the two parts of the town where the greatest number of the Africans lived, as well as Stovner, Grnlkka and Sndre Nordstrand.

src: Those from North America were spread fairly evenly across Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo, Vestre Aker and Nordre Aker.
mt: 那些来自北美的动物在弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,老奥斯陆,维斯特雷阿克和诺德雷阿克分布相对均.
ref: 来自北美的学生相当平均地分布在 Frogner、grünerl kka、Gamle Oslo、Vestre Aker 和 Nordre Aker。
dipper_l80_o40: North Americans were fairly evenly distributed between Frogner, Grnland, Old Oslo, Vester-Aker and Nord-Aker.

src: Citizens from South and Central America were most commonly found in Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo St.Hanshaugen and Sagene.
mt: 来自南美和中美洲的公民最常见于弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,古奥斯陆圣汉沙根和萨格内.

src: This phone had so many issues that it honestly shocked me how the previous Stylos were so wonderful.
mt: 之前的手机是如此精彩,
ref: 这部手机有如此多的问题，它真的让我震惊，以前的触控笔是如此之好。
dipper_l80_o40: This telephone had so many faults that I was really surprised that the previous Stylos had been so wonderful.

src: I was never even able to sucessfully have this phone transferred to my Virgin Mobile account.
mt: 我甚至无法成功地将这部手机转移到我的维珍移动账户.
ref: 我甚至从来没有能够成功地将这部手机转移到我的 Virgin Mobile 账户。
dipper_l80_o40: I was never able to transfer this phone to my Virgin Mobile account.

src: I messed around for a little less than a week with this phone.
mt: 我用这个手机玩不到一周.
ref: 我摆弄这部手机还不到一周。
dipper_l80_o40: I spent a week or so playing with this telephone.

src: I searched for information on the internet and made various calls desperately trying to give the Stylo 3 the benefit of the doubt hoping it was just me doing something wrong but sadly I wasted a lot of time doing so because it was 100% the phone having all the problems I didn't want to admit.
mt: 我在网上搜索了信息, 打了几次电话, 绝望地试图让Stylo 3获得疑问的好处,
ref: 我在互联网上搜索信息，打了各种电话，拼命试图给 Stylo 3 好处，只希望是我做错了，但可悲的是，我浪费了很多时间做这个，因为这个手机的所有问题是我接受不了的。
dipper_l80_o40: I searched the Internet and made several phone calls, trying to find out if I was doing something wrong. Unfortunately, I wasted a lot of time, because it was the phone that was causing all the problems.

src: I hate the fact that I have to give a Stylo such a horrible rating and review but I was extremly disappointed with this phone.
mt: 虽然我不喜欢给Stylo这样的评价,
ref: 令我失望的是，我不得不给 Stylo 如此糟糕的评价和评论，但我对这款手机非常失望。
dipper_l80_o40: I am sorry to have to give such a poor rating and review to a Stylo, but I was very disappointed with this phone.

src: Hopefully LG ups their game and can improve the future Stylos if there are any but this was a huge BUST.
mt: 让我们一起来看看.
ref: 这是一个巨大的败笔，如果可以的话，希望 LG 升级他们的游戏，并能改进未来的触控笔。
dipper_l80_o40: The Stylos was a great flop. Let’s hope that the next Stylos will be better.

src: On the bright side, the return and my refund went smoothly but that's about it.
mt: 幸运的是,退款和退款顺利进行,
ref: 从好的方面来看，退货和我的退款进展顺利，但仅此而已。
dipper_l80_o40: On the bright side, the return and the refund went well, but that was all.
